programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Although the once-hot game show Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? had lost its luster as a prime-time ABC offering, the producers felt that there was enough life left in the property to warrant a Monday-through-Friday syndicated version. Taking over from the earlier series' host Regis Philbin was Meredith Vieira of The View. To make certain that the series would not be bankrupted after its first week on the air, the questions posed to contestants were considerably harder than those on the prime-time incarnation. Also, the famous "fastest finger" round was eliminated, taking some of the pressure off the contestants when they struggled to come up with answers. The most noteworthy change from the original version was the absence of Regis Philbin's familiar catchphrases: One would never hear Meredith Vieira chime in with the legendary "Is that your final answer?" The syndicated Who Wants to Be a Millionaire? was launched on September 16, 2002(r)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Rich People Problems. Max agrees to help Caroline break into the luxury townhouse where she used to live in order to retrieve her dental night guard, which she left behind in her old bedroom. With Johnny's help, they manage to get inside the building and Max is exposed to the extravagance of Caroline's former lifestyle for the first time. Max gains new respect for her friend, because now she knows just how much Caroline has been forced to give up. Meanwhile, Han attempts to bring karaoke-style entertainment to the restaurant, much to Max's annoyance(n)

programme.title: 2 Broke Girls
programme.desc: And the Girlfriend Experience. Han is in a fix when his mother pays a visit from Korea, as he has sent her photos of an exotic dancer claiming that she is his sophisticated, deeply religious, Harvard-educated girlfriend. He begs Max and Caroline to get him out of trouble by finding the stripper, giving her a makeover and persuading her to play the part of his real-life girlfriend in front of his mother(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: Highlights of 100. Jerry Seinfeld, the actor, continues to recount the first 99 episodes of the show that featured the comedic adventures of Jerry Seinfeld, the character, and his friends George, Elaine, and Kramer. Highlight clips from the first five and a half seasons of the show fill this episode, which was originally the second half of a one-hour episode. "Highlights of a Hundred" was actually shot after all of the episodes for the show's sixth season had been taped, despite airing February 2, 1995, in the middle of the season. It was later split into two half-hour programs for syndication(n)

programme.title: TMZ
programme.desc: This daily show-biz gossip and "expose" series was a spinoff of the popular interactive website TMZ, an acronym for the "Thirty Mile Zone" surrounding Hollywood. Created in 2005, TMZ had gained national prominence by breaking the story of Mel Gibson's anti-Semitic tirade after his arrest for drunken driving. By the time the TV version of TMZ premiered the week of September 10, 2007, the operation had once again scooped its scandal-rag competition with its coverage of O.J. Simpson's profanity-laden "invasion" of the home of a collectibles dealer who was allegedly selling Simpson memorabilia without permission. In fact, TMZ on TV had a wealth of celebrity-meltdown yarns to choose from during its shakedown week, ranging from the substance-abuse problems of Lindsay Lohan to the ill-fated "comeback" concert of Britney Spears. Harvey Levin, managing editor for both versions of TMZ, appeared on-camera as a correspondent, along with Sean Borg, Michael Hundgen, Katie Darryl and Teresa Strasser. TMZ on TV was seen primarily on local Fox or Fox-owned affiliates throughout the U.S(n)

programme.title: Taken 2
programme.desc: His family targeted by a vengeful crime boss in Istanbul, retired CIA agent Bryan Mills (Liam Neeson) must fight an army of killers to ensure their safe return in this action sequel from director Olivier Megaton (Transporter 3) and producer/co-writer Luc Besson (who penned the screenplay alongside Taken scribe Robert Mark Kamen). As the families of the kidnappers killed by Mills gather together for a mass funeral, their leader Merad (Rade Sherbedgia) vows to make the man who brought them so much misery pay. Meanwhile, back in the U.S., Mills invites his ex-wife Lenore (Famke Janssen) and their daughter Kim (Maggie Grace) to join him on a trip to Istanbul after their long-planned trip to China falls through. Later, in Istanbul, the family is settling in and enjoying the sites when Merad's gang abducts Mills and Lenore. Communicating with her father via a hidden cell phone, Kim accesses his secret weapons cache and embarks on a frantic race through an unfamiliar city in a bid to rescue her parents from certain death. Once she manages to free her father, Mills puts his "particular set of skills" to use while attempting to rescue his Lenore, and escape Merad's unrelenting attack(n)

Later, in Istanbul, the family is settling in and enjoying the sites when Merad's gang abducts Mills and Lenore. Communicating with her father via a hidden cell phone, Kim accesses his secret weapons cache and embarks on a frantic race through an unfamiliar city in a bid to rescue her parents from certain death. Once she manages to free her father, Mills puts his "particular set of skills" to use while attempting to rescue his Lenore, and escape Merad's unrelenting attack(n)

When a wealthy married couple is murdered execution style, the SVU team quickly ascertains that the victims had been laundering money for a Colombian drug cartel--the same criminals who had previously ordered the shooting of former Assistant DA Alexandra Cabot (Stephanie March), forcing her into the Witness Protection Program. In order to put away the elusive hitman known only as "The Ghost" (Bryan F. O'Byrne, Cabot must emerge from hiding and provide testimony. . .even if it means sacrificing her life in the process. Though this episode marks the final Law & Order: Special Victims Unit appearance of former regular Stephanie March, she would return in the same role in the 2006 spinoff series Conviction

programme.title: Snakehead Terror
programme.desc: Cashing in on the real-life influx of pesky "snake-head" fish in Midwestern lakes, this inexpensive sci-fi epic is set in a small Maryland fishing community called Cultus Lake. A dangerous strain of mutated snakeheads has decimated the lake's fish population, whereupon Doc Jenkins (played by X-Files' William B. Davis, aka "Cigarette-Smoking Man"), the shady owner of a nearby chemical plant, fills the water with pollutants to kill off the invaders. At the same time, the local leaders, desperate to pull Cultus Lake out of a severe financial slump, has dumped human growth hormones in the lake to improve the stock. You guessed it: Both the chemicals and hormones succeed only in making the snakeheads even larger and more ferocious--and worse still, they are now leaving the lake and crawling around on dry land, in search of human blood! Caught in the middle of the crisis is Sheriff Patrick James (Bruce Boxleitner) and the standard-issue beautiful female biologist Lori Dale (Carol Alt). An amalgam of every cheesy CGI effect ever seen on the many Jaws ripoffs that have proliferated as made-for-cable and direct-to-video thrillers, Snakehead Terror received its biggest audience when it was telecast by the Sci-Fi network on March 13, 2004

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Mr. Bevis. Scriptwriter Rod Serling had intended the June 3, 1960, Twilight Zone episode as the pilot for a TV series starring Burgess Meredith, but when Meredith balked, the title role was recast with Orson Bean. A natural-born eccentric and misfit, James B.W. Bevis somehow or other warrants the special attention of guardian angel J. Hardy Hempstead (Henry Jones). After briefly tasting success for the first time in his life, however, Bevis decides that he was happier when he was a loser. TV-series perennials Charles Lane, William Schallert, Horace McMahon, and Vito Scotti make brief appearances. Though "Mr. Bevis" did not graduate to a weekly series, Serling recycled the premise for his 1962 Twilight Zone episode "Cavender Is Coming" -- and, to a lesser extent, for the second-season installment "Mr. Dingle the Strong."

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: The Mighty Casey. This episode was based on an earlier Rod Serling TV play, in which a losing baseball team was saved by a 70-year-old pitcher. In the Twilight Zone version of this yarn, the old man was transformed into a muscular robot named Casey (Robert Sorrell), who comes to the rescue of the cellar-dwelling ball club skippered by Mouth McGarry. Winning game after game, Casey ultimately comes acropper when he suddenly develops human emotions -- and an unwillingness to see anyone lose a ball game! When first filmed in mid-1959, "The Mighty Casey" starred Paul Douglas as Mouth McGarry. Unfortunately, Douglas was in the last stages of the devastating illness that would kill him, and the producers were uncomfortable with his appearance on the screen. After Douglas' death, the episode was refilmed with Jack Warden as McGarry, with Alvin Ganzer taking over the directorial reins from Robert Parrish. "The Mighty Casey" finally aired June 17, 1960, as the next-to-last Twilight Zone of the 1959-60 season

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: King Nine Will Not Return. As had been the case with the first season's inaugural episode "Where Is Everybody?", the second season of Twilight Zone opened with a "solo" drama, wherein the protagonist finds himself alone in a bizarre situation, with no memory of how he got there. In "King Nine Will Not Return," Robert Cummings stars as Army Air Force captain James Embry, who awakens to find himself stumbling through the desert, near the wreckage of a WWII bomber. Laboriously putting the pieces together, Embry desperately searches for his fellow crew members, who seemingly appear and disappear right before his eyes. Inspired by the recent disovery of the wreckage of the American bomber Lady Be Good in the Libyan Desert, "King Nine Will Not Return" was written by Rod Serling and first aired September 30, 1960(n)

programme.title: Impractical Jokers
programme.desc: The Stoop Sessions Part 1. Hidden camera show where four friends - Joel Dommet, Roisin Conaty, Paul McCaffrey and Marek Larwood - compete to embarrass each another in everyday situations. Pushing each other to the limit, they take it in turns to complete embarrassing challenges. They have got to do or say everything the other jokers tell them via a hidden earpiece, but if they refuse they lose and face a humiliating forfeit. It's a ruthless fight to finish where there are no winners, just a loser. The jokers cause havoc when they take over a bakery, risk a punch in the face as they secretly try to touch strangers with just their noses, clear the streets with an obscene megaphone they can't control and kiss strangers' toes when they work at a foot spa(r)

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: At the height of the successful TV series Alias,Jennifer Garner starred in this sensitive, amusing comedy on dreams that come true, but are followed by disappointments... and much confusion! Jenna Rink is a teenager who dreams of being part of the school's popular group of girls. And, on her 13th birthday, she despises her best friend, Matt, just to impress her friends… who end up doing the same to her. Tormented by the troubles of adolescence, Jenna wishes from the bottom of her heart to leap from being 13 to being 30. As if by magic, she appears in a modern apartment in Manhattan. Jenna is now the powerful editor of a fashion magazine and has what she always dreamed of. Except friends. Now she must face some truly amusing situations, since her head is still that of a 13-year-old girl. Only one person can help her recover what she has left behind: her old friend Matt (Mark Ruffalo)(n)

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Coming to You Live. FLASHPOINT is a drama that depicts the emotional journey into the tough, risk-filled lives of a group of cops in the SRU (inspired by Toronto's Emergency Task Force). It's a unique unit that rescues hostages, busts gangs, defuses bombs, climbs the sides of buildings and talks down suicidal teens. Members of a highly-skilled tactical team, they're also trained in negotiating, profiling and getting inside the suspect's head to diffuse the situation to try and save lives

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy and the Dummy. When Ricky (Desi Arnaz) takes a pass on performing at an MGM studio party, Lucy (Lucille Ball) cooks up a scheme to attend the affair herself, using a life-size rubber dummy ("Raggedy Ricky") as her partner in a dance act. Unfortunately, the dummy gets stuck on Lucy's Spanish dress, and refuses to "leave" when she wants it to. As a result of this public spectacle, Lucy is offered a one-year contract to star in MGM comedies -- but is she psychologically ready for all of her showbiz dreams to come true?

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky Sells the Car. Preparing for the return trip from Hollywood to New York, Ricky (Desi Arnaz) sells his car for a profit and elects to make the eastward journey by train. Entrusted with the purchase of the train tickets, Lucy (Lucille Ball) accidentally buys only three from the ticketmaster -- meaning that either she, Ricky, Fred (William Frawley), or Ethel (Vivian Vance) will have to arrange for another mode of transportation. Without revealing any further plot details, it can be noted that this is the episode in which Fred and Ethyl roar into view aside a WWI-vintage Harley-Davidson motorcycle!

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Great Train Robbery. Lucy gets mixed up with a jewel thief (Harry Bartell) on a cross-country rail trip that marks the end of the series' Hollywood sojourn. That's not the only reason it's a bumpy ride. Another is that Lucy keeps pulling the emergency-brake cord. Conductor: Frank Nelson. Mrs. McGillicuddy: Kathryn Card. Mr. Estes: Lou Krugman. Detective: Joseph Crehan

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Homecoming. Upon returning to New York, Ricky (Desi Arnaz) is lavished with so much attention because of his upcoming movie debut that Lucy (Lucille Ball) begins to feel neglected. Imagine her delight, then, when a journalist (Elvia Allman) asks Lucy for an interview. Anxiously preparing for the big moment, Lucy has no idea that the journalist merely wants to use Lucy to get a story from Ricky. This leads to a climactic comic set piece in which Lucy, impressed that Ricky has become so lofty a celebrity, decides to treat him like a king -- until he takes unfair advantage of her strange new behavior

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Ricardos Are Interviewed. The Ricardos are to be interviewed, at home, on a TV show. The trouble is, their apartment is a bit shabby for a celebrity such as Ricky. That's what the Mertzes think, anyway, but Lucy and Ricky are far too loyal to move. So Fred and Ethel devise a plan to get the Ricardos into a better place...they pick a fight with them. Johnny Clark: John Gallaudet. Edward Warren: Elliott Reid

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Goes to the Rodeo. When Ricky (Desi Arnaz) is unable to appear in Fred's lodge variety show, Fred (William Frawley) enlists the "talents" of Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance). Since the show is going to have a Western theme, Fred asks his old pal Rattlesnake Jones (Dub Taylor) to act as technical advisor and musical coach. As things turn out, Ricky is hired to emcee a rodeo -- and he needs to put together a "cowboy" show in only two days. So just guess what happens next

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Nursery School. At the insistence of Ricky (Desi Arnaz), Little Ricky (Joseph A. Mayer and Michael Mayer) spends his first day at nursery school -- and Lucy (Lucille Ball) is as nervous as a mother hen. Much to her relief, the boy adapts well to school, but close proximity to other children causes him to develop a slight cold. Lucy takes Little Ricky to the doctor, who diagnoses tonsillitis, necessitating a minor operation. Determined to spend the night with Little Ricky in his hospital room, Lucy disguises herself as a nurse -- and the medical profession will never be the same

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky's European Booking. Ricky's band is going on a European tour but he can't afford to take Lucy---who's not about to take this lying down. Her plan: raffle off a TV set to benefit "Ladies Overseas Aid." "We're ladies," Lucy tells Ethel (who's scheming to go, too). "We want to go overseas. And, boy, do we need aid." Mr. Feldman: Harry Antrim. Mr. Jamison: Barney Phillips. The Pied Pipers perform the theme from Ball and Arnaz's 1956 movie "Forever Darling."

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Passports. It's all settled: Lucy (Lucille Ball) will be allowed to go along when Ricky (Desi Arnaz) and his band take their European tour, and so will Fred and Ethel Mertz (William Frawley, Vivian Vance), inasmuch as Fred has been temporarily appointed Ricky's manager. Alas, Lucy won't be able to get a passport until she produces her birth certificate -- which she can't. But there's good news from the passport officials: if Lucy can provide at least two people willing to verify that they've known her since birth, she can cut through the bureaucracy. However, the witnesses fall through, leaving Lucy no other option but to try to stow away on the Europe-bound ocean liner -- and this leads to the classic slapstick set piece wherein Lucy is locked in a steamer trunk

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Staten Island Ferry. With a European trip coming up, Fred remembers that he suffers from seasickness. Lucy has the solution: seasickness pills and a trial run on the Staten Island Ferry. Ferry Attendant: Stanely Farrar. Passport Clerk: Charles Lane

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Bon Voyage. Can the Ricardos depart for Europe without mishap? Of course not: Lucy misses the boat. No problem, she's told: a pilot boat can take her out to the ship. And if that turns out to be a problem there's always a helicopter. Of course, it can't actually land on deck, but it can hover over it. Officer: Tyler McVey. Dispatcher: Jack Albertson. programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Friends and Family
programme.desc: In the band's hometown of Denver, a throng of needy friends and family descend upon the crew, including band member Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, who must be kept away from him at all costs

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Friends and Family
programme.desc: In the band's hometown of Denver, a throng of needy friends and family descend upon the crew, including band member Christopher House's infamous ex-girlfriend, who must be kept away from him at all costs(c)

programme.title: Reservoir Dogs
programme.desc: Four black-suited, sunglasses-sporting criminals try to determine which of them is a rat or cop after a bank heist goes violently awry, in this stylish crime thriller that cleverly jumps around in time and features the witty, ironic dialogue and unexpected plot twists that would soon become the pop film culture hallmarks of first-time writer and director Quentin Tarantino. Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth and Steve Buscemi star in this instant classic

programme.title: Rules Of Engagement
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson stars in this military drama as Terry Childers, a decorated Marine Corps colonel who orders his troops to fire on civilians during an uprising in a war-torn Middle Eastern nation. Faced with court-martial, Childers' only hope is his old friend Hayes Hodges (Tommy Lee Jones), a lawyer who owes his life to Terry. Blair Underwood, Bruce Greenwood, Ben Kingsley, Anne Archer and Guy Pearce costar in this drama from director William Friedkin ("The Exorcist," "To Live and Die in L.A.")

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame

programme.title: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
programme.desc: Epic historical drama directed by Ridley Scott that revolves around Christopher Columbus' famed journey, from convincing the Spanish queen to finance his expedition to setting sail, quelling potential mutinies and a triumphant return home only to find that his dream of a peaceful new world clashes with a Spanish nobleman's visions of conquest. Stars Gerard Depardieu and Sigourney Weaver

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?

programme.title: Woman in Gold
programme.desc: Sixty years after fleeing Vienna, an elderly Jewish woman (Helen Mirren) attempts to reclaim family possessions that were seized by the Nazis. Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is back for more fast-paced action in this high-intensity sequel from director John Woo ("Face/Off"). Cruise is Ethan Hunt, a talented government agent ordered to bring down Sean Ambrose (Dougray Scott), a rogue fellow spy who plans to auction a stolen, deadly virus to the highest bidder. The bait? Ambrose's former lover Nyah (Thandie Newton), whose beauty and charm are not lost on Ethan. Anthony Hopkins, Ving Rhames, Rade Serbedzija and Brendan Gleeson costar in this hit thriller

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier
programme.desc: A crime drama based on true events that follows the rise of Carlton Leach, one of the most feared thugs of the London and Essex soccer world, as he goes from a life of hooliganism to becoming a member of a notorious gang that rampaged the scene in the late 80s

programme.title: Mission: Impossible 2
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is back for more fast-paced action in this high-intensity sequel from director John Woo ("Face/Off"). Cruise is Ethan Hunt, a talented government agent ordered to bring down Sean Ambrose (Dougray Scott), a rogue fellow spy who plans to auction a stolen, deadly virus to the highest bidder. The bait? Ambrose's former lover Nyah (Thandie Newton), whose beauty and charm are not lost on Ethan. Anthony Hopkins, Ving Rhames, Rade Serbedzija and Brendan Gleeson costar in this hit thriller

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Awards® winners Billy Bob Thornton and Dennis Quaid star in this historical epic set in 19th century Texas during the famed siege of Alamo, where a group of men led by Colonel Travis, along with Davey Crockett and Jim Bowie, fought against the odds, for the independence of Texas

programme.title: Punch Drunk Love
programme.desc: Adam Sandler stars in this dark comedy centering around a socially impaired small business owner, dominated by seven sisters, who attempts to find romance, despite his debilitating, awkward quirks. Paul Thomas Anderson directs and Emily Watson co-stars

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: Ray
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx stars as the American legend Ray Charles in this musical drama that is an unflinching portrait of the soulful singer's battle to overcome addiction, fight segregation and revolutionize the music as he transformed into one of the country's most beloved performers. Also stars Kerry Washington

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Remake of the classic blaxploitation action flick starring Samuel L. Jackson as John Shaft, a New York cop seeking a murder witness (Toni Collette) who can finger a spoiled construction business heir (Christian Bale) for the racially motivated murder of a black student. In the meantime, the wealthy killer has enlisted the aid of a drug dealer (Jeffrey Wright) who wants to move into big league narcotics trafficking. Vanessa L. Williams and Busta Rhymes costar

programme.title: Get Even Before Leavin'
programme.desc: With the Russian mob threatening his family, Ray finds himself on a road trip with Mickey to Primm, in hopes of recovering money stolen from a local casino owner. Bunchy and Bridget take turns looking after baby Maria when Teresa withdraws to her family's house. And Terry gains confidence as a trainer(c)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Death Squad
programme.desc: In the year 2047, a rebel war agent is forced to go up against an oppressive government to expose their war crimes, while evading a vicious death squad. Stars Danny Glover, Daryl Hannah and Stephen Baldwin

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: In a futuristic world where society has collapsed and water is scarce, a 17-year-old girl decides to take on the henchmen of a greedy water baron, who is violently laying claim to the precious resources that are left

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: See No Evil
programme.desc: A group of troubled teenagers furloughed from juvenile detention to clean up an abandoned hotel slated to become a homeless shelter discover that a psychopathic killer now inhabits the premises and is more than eager to spill some blood. Steven Vidler and professional wrestler Kane (a.k.a. Glen Jacobs) star in this grisly horror thriller

programme.title: Death Squad
programme.desc: In the year 2047, a rebel war agent is forced to go up against an oppressive government to expose their war crimes, while evading a vicious death squad. Stars Danny Glover, Daryl Hannah and Stephen Baldwin

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Russell Mulcahy's Tale of the Mummy
programme.desc: A centuries old curse is awakened by a young archeologist who sets out to retrace her grandfather's footsteps by unearthing an ancient Egyptian mummy -- and now she is on the run from a deadly power that threatens to destroy humanity

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T

programme.title: Ticks (1992)
programme.desc: A group of troubled teenagers led by social workers on a California wilderness retreat discover that the woods they are camping in have become infested by mutated, blood-sucking ticks. Stars Seth Green

programme.title: Arachnophobia
programme.desc: When a small, sleepy California town is overrun by killer spiders, who'll save the day? Will it be nice guy Doctor Ross Jennings (Jeff Daniels)? How about noted entomologist James Atherton (Julian Sands)? Then again, maybe the town's best hope lies in big, bad Delbert McClintock (John Goodman), the "Rambo" of pest controllers. A blend of laughs and chills, this self-styled "thrill-omedy" is the directorial debut of producer Frank Marshall. Harley Jane Kozak and Stuart Pankin costar

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: Garm Wars: The Last Druid
programme.desc: In a world where clone soldiers from three military tribes are locked in a perpetual battle of air, land and technology, one clone is separated from the battle and finds herself on a quest for the truth with an unlikely trio

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: The Thaw
programme.desc: Val Kilmer stars as a famed scientist who unearths a prehistoric specimen in the Arctic that soon unleashes a swarm of dangerous parasites, forcing himself and his students to quarantine themselves or risk infecting the world

programme.title: Ticks (1992)
programme.desc: A group of troubled teenagers led by social workers on a California wilderness retreat discover that the woods they are camping in have become infested by mutated, blood-sucking ticks. Stars Seth Green

programme.desc: When a death row inmate survives his execution and returns as a supernatural, unholy creature, a mysterious community of drifters and criminals must band together to defeat the monster or perish in the depths of hell

programme.title: The Hybrid
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries are chosen to carry out a covert operation deep in a former Soviet State that sends them into a maze of tunnels inhabited by menacing creatures and towards an underground laboratory where they must secure specimens of genetically engineered human and alien hybrids

programme.title: The Roost

Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wet Foot/Dry Foot
programme.desc: Two Cuban refugees attempting to reach the United States on a handmade raft find themselves stranded on a deserted island off the Florida coast in the winning short film from this year's competition

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Adios, Para Siempre
programme.desc: A crime scene photographer is drawn into an ingenious game of images that could spell his doom in this short from filmmaker David Guillermo Barba

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: A story of allegiance between a man of honor and a creature of legend - the very last dragon. Dennis Quaid stars as a knight who, with his companion, an 18-foot high dragon (voiced by Sean Connery), join forces in a heroic battle to free a country from the iron grip of its tyrannical ruler

programme.title: Donovan's Echo
programme.desc: Danny Glover stars as a brilliant mathematician who returns to his family home after 30 years away to discover that tragic events from his past may be in danger of repeating themselves. Plagued by déjà vu, he is convinced his young neighbor and her mother are doomed to die on the anniversary of his wife and daughter's deaths. Struggling to unlock the pattern, he tries to convince his brother-in-law, a policeman, of the impending tragedy, but the facts don't add up. Is he losing his mind, or running out of time?

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. programme.title: The Maddening
programme.desc: Burt Reynolds stars in his psycho-horror about a mother and daughter who find themselves the victim of a deranged father, who'll stop at nothing to protect his family's secrets

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Based on an inspiring true story, Academy Award® winner Cuba Gooding Jr. stars as a man released from prison after 18 years, who starts a chess club to keep inner-city youth from the streets and give them what he never had: a future

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Rise of the Footsoldier
programme.desc: A crime drama based on true events that follows the rise of Carlton Leach, one of the most feared thugs of the London and Essex soccer world, as he goes from a life of hooliganism to becoming a member of a notorious gang that rampaged the scene in the late 80s

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead

programme.title: Patrick
programme.desc: In this Australian horror flick a young nurse begins work at an isolated psychiatric ward, and quickly becomes fascinated with a brain dead patient who is the subject of a mad scientist's cruel and unusual experiments. What starts as an innocent fascination quickly takes a sinister turn, as the patient begins to use his psychic powers to manipulate her every move

programme.title: Growing Up and Other Lies
programme.desc: Four best friends decide to recreate the greatest adventure of their lives, and walk the entire length of Manhattan in one last attempt to find the love and adventure from their glory days. Stars Adam Brody and Josh Lawson

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After suffering humiliation by a rival crew, a street dancer gathers the best dancers from around the world for a rematch

programme.title: Don't Blink
programme.desc: A gripping suspense thriller about a group of friends who arrive at a secluded mountain resort to find it completely deserted. With no gas for the return trip, they are forced to stay and investigate the mystery surrounding the abandoned lodge. Stars Mena Suvari

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: LEAVE THE WORLD BEHIND: Swedish House Mafia's Final Tour
programme.desc: Documentary following electronic super band Swedish House Mafia on their final tour before they call it quits that offers a rare look at the electronic music world, with breathtaking live footage and behind-the-scenes drama of three musicians who walk away from everything to save their friendship

programme.title: Conan O'Brien / Jeffrey Tambor
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Conan O'Brien and Jeffrey Tambor(c)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: Documentary charting the raucous history of the infamous spring vacation revelries in Daytona, which started in the early 60s, and by the 1980s led to the arrival of tens of thousands of college students, lured by lust, booze, fun in the sun and eventually, the hope to make it onto MTV

programme.title: Exists
programme.desc: When a group of friends on a camping trip have an accident on a desolate country road, they unwittingly unleash a bloodcurdling force of nature

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: In this psychological action-thriller, an elite group of the FBI's most talented young agents, skilled in reading the minds of elusive serial killers, is being intensively trained on a remote island. But they soon learn that there is a killer among them and they must find a way to get out alive. Stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: This rawboned action conspiracy thriller stars Mark Wahlberg as a former Marine Corps sniper Bob Lee Swagger, who answers his country's call when a retired colonel (Danny Glover) enlists him to stop a presidential assassin. The twist is that Bob Lee finds himself tagged as the patsy in a murderous conspiracy, with only an FBI rookie (Michael Pena) on his side

programme.title: Don't Blink

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A group of people working to stay alive in a post-apocalyptic future discover what they think is a safe, abandoned farmhouse, but they soon find themselves fighting to stay alive as a gang of bloodthirsty predators attack

programme.title: Spring Breakers
programme.desc: After four college girls are busted for robbing a fast food shack to fund their spring break, they are unexpectedly bailed out by an infamous local thug who lures them into a criminal underbelly and takes them on a wild, violent and riotous vacation. Stars Selena Gomez and James Franco

programme.desc: A young man is stalked by a serial killer who supposedly died decades ago

programme.desc: Series host David Steinberg talks to a pair of television stars who got their starts in standup comedy but became known for shows that hilariously blended reality and fantasy, pushing the limits of the sitcom format(c)

programme.desc: Documentary exploring the pop culture phenomenon of the mysterious music duo Daft Punk, which pulls back the masks of the Grammy award winning French musicians, who are famed for performing in robot attire that hides their faces. Includes radio interviews, rare footage and exclusive interviews with their close friends and collaborators

programme.title: Lost Songs: The Basement Tapes Continued
programme.desc: A documentary that goes behind the scenes with some of today's most talented songwriters as they make new music based on long-lost, newly discovered lyrics from Bob Dylan's legendary Basement Tapes sessions. T Bone Burnett brings Elvis Costello, Rhiannon Gddens, Taylor Goldsmith, Jim James and Marcus Mumford together in a dramatic two-week studio session in the basement of Capitol Records. Features an exclusive interview with Bob Dylan. Directed by Sam Jones

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: The Next Hit

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. Also stars Kathryn Hahn and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Scar Tissue
programme.desc: A young man is stalked by a serial killer who supposedly died decades ago

programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: The Nasty Show hosted by Artie Lange
programme.desc: In this comedy special, the legendary Artie Lange hosts a line up of the most deranged and hilarious minds in comedy that's not for the faint of heart. Features Mike Wilmot, Mike Ward, Gina Yashere, Luenell, Jimmy Carr and Gilbert Gottfried

programme.desc: An ambitious, beautiful TV news reporter climbs the ladder of broadcasting success while romancing her more experienced mentor in this romantic drama that plays like "A Star is Born" set in the world of journalism. Michelle Pfeiffer, Robert Redford and Stockard Channing star

Stars Gwyneth Paltrow, Huey Lewis and Paul Giamatti

This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: 3:10 To Yuma
programme.desc: Russell Crowe and Christian Bale star in this blazing Western remake as, respectively, a daring outlaw and the humble farmer deputized to deliver him to justice. Peter Fonda, Gretchen Mol, Ben Foster and Alan Tudyk costar in this acclaimed frontier adventure

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A simple case of mistaken identity lands a smart-aleck hero named Slevin (Josh Hartnett) in the middle of a New York gang war where nobody is who he or she seems to be. Bruce Willis, Lucy Liu, Morgan Freeman, Ben Kingsley and Stanley Tucci costar in this crackling puzzle of a thriller from director Paul McGuigan

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions

programme.title: Kill Kane
programme.desc: A family man seeks revenge when his wife and children are murdered by infamous gangsters. Taking matters into his own hands, he pursues vigilante justice on the streets, hunting down those who robbed him of a future

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: Stand-up W. Kamua Bell hosts the hottest comics at the SXSW festival in the first of this two-part showcase featuring today's heavyweights and tomorrow's stars, including Beth Stelling, Iliza Shlesinger, Mark Normand, Matt Braunger, and Nate Bargatze

programme.title: Genesis - Sum of the Parts
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling one of the most successful British bands in rock history that reunites members Tony Banks, Phil Collins, Peter Gabriel, Steve Hackett and Mike Rutherford for the first time since 1975 to tell their tale from first beginnings, to career highs and lows, with unseen archive material and rare performance footage from across their entire career

programme.title: The Way Of The Gun
programme.desc: From the screenwriter of "The Usual Suspects" comes this action-packed thriller starring Ryan Phillippe and Benicio del Toro as kidnappers angling for a big payday by snatching a pregnant woman (Juliette Lewis) who's carrying a wealthy couple's surrogate child. Unfortunately, a Mafia lawyer (James Caan) and his assassins (Taye Diggs and Nicky Katt) are taking the situation very personally, leading to a bloody desert confrontation where hidden truths are revealed

programme.title: Keeping Up With The Steins
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood battles his terrible shyness as his father wages his own battle to throw a bar mitzvah party that will outdo his rival. But everything is upended when the boy's estranged grandfather arrives in town, in this satire of materialism

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame

programme.title: Woman in Gold

Among them is a famous portrait of her beloved aunt, painted by Gustav Klimt. With the help of a young lawyer she embarks upon a lengthy legal battle to recover what rightfully belongs to her family

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: This Academy Award® winning classic masterfully unravels from an LA interrogation room where the police are questioning a conman in order to solve the case of a multimillion-dollar heist gone wrong that involved himself and four other criminals under the thrall of a mythic crime lord. Stars Kevin Spacey, Stephen Baldwin, Gabriel Byrne and Pete Postelthwaite

programme.title: Santa Cruz vs. Ruiz
programme.desc: In anticipation of the upcoming featherweight world championship showdown between Leo Santa Cruz and Kiko Martinez, relive this classic match-up between Santa Cruz and Jesus Ruiz

programme.title: Santa Cruz vs Seda
programme.desc: In anticipation of the September 13, 2014 pay per view rematch between boxing superstars Floyd Mayweather and Marcos Maidana - and featuring Leo Santa Cruz - relive this classic match between Santa Cruz and Cesar Seda

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: The demented serial killer Jigsaw (Tobin Bell) returns in this hit horror sequel in which cop Eric Matthews (Donnie Wahlberg) too easily captures the fiendish murderer, only to helplessly observe as his son is trapped with seven other people in a ghoulish prison devised by the close-mouthed Jigsaw to require acts of horrific self-mutilation to escape. Shawnee Smith, Glenn Plummer, Dina Meyer, Eric Knudsen, Franky G. and Emmanuelle Vaugier costar

programme.title: Happy in the Valley
programme.desc: A washed up rock star photographer who now shoots porn stars tries a desperate attempt to get back into the spotlight by hiring a struggling art student to turn the camera on him to tell his life story, but the complicated and sordid world he lives in threatens to destroy him

programme.title: Spark: A Burning Man Story
programme.desc: A compelling behind-the-scenes look into the cultural phenomenon of Burning Man. Filmmakers Steve Brown and Jessie Deeter embed themselves with the cofounders, staff and a select group of artists and attendees to create an inside look at this magical happening and its ongoing evolution, the people who make it a reality, and the unique effect it has on all those who attend

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie) is a buxom cross between Indiana Jones and James Bond, a British aristocrat who makes her living acquiring priceless antiquities by any means necessary. When she discovers that an ancient relic sought by her late father holds the key to power over time, she's quickly strapping on her side arms and hopping the globe, hoping to beat a sinister ancient group called the Illuminati in the quest to recover the artifact. Jon Voight, Iain Glen and Mark Collie costar in this action-packed smash based on a popular video game

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection

programme.title: The Next Hit
programme.desc: A mystery suspense thriller about a record company that takes an unorthodox approach to boosting sales by putting a 'hit' on their marquee talent's life with hopes of creating a multi-platinum recording legend

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart stars as a young woman who joins the military to escape her small town roots but ends up as a rookie guard at Guantanamo Bay where she strikes up an unusual and life changing friendship with one of the detainees

programme.title: Slow Burn (2007)
programme.desc: A district attorney who's running for mayor suddenly finds himself embroiled in a case of murder and financial corruption in this edgy thriller starring Ray Liotta, LL Cool J, Jolene Blalock, Mekhi Phifer, Taye Diggs and Chewitel Ejiofor

programme.title: Just Let Go - Lenny Kravitz Live
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling a six-month Lenny Kravitz tour from Paris to New York and beyond, which examines the crucial relationship between him and his illustrious band. On rooftops, in muscle cars, propped up in dive bars, and in pool halls, the band talk candidly about life on the road, sharing the stage, improvising, translating the music from the studio and Lenny Kravitz's quest for perfection

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Lara Croft (Angelina Jolie) is a buxom cross between Indiana Jones and James Bond, a British aristocrat who makes her living acquiring priceless antiquities by any means necessary. When she discovers that an ancient relic sought by her late father holds the key to power over time, she's quickly strapping on her side arms and hopping the globe, hoping to beat a sinister ancient group called the Illuminati in the quest to recover the artifact. Jon Voight, Iain Glen and Mark Collie costar in this action-packed smash based on a popular video game

programme.title: Williams vs. Ishida (R)
programme.desc: Former two-time welterweight and junior middleweight title holder Paul Williams (40-2, 27 KO's) meets in a scheduled 12-round bout at the AmericanBank Center in Corpus Christi, Texas, against Nobuhiro Ishida (24-6-2, 9 KO's), whose most recent pair of fights were surprise first-round victories. Also featured: light heavyweight Tavoris Cloud defends his title against Gabriel Campillo of Spain(c)

programme.title: Carousel of Sex
programme.desc: After falling for a handsome philanthropist, a working woman, who lives life to the fullest, fantasizes about a new life. Will she run away or will her voluptuous rival steal her happiness away?

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead

programme.title: Cyborg 2
programme.desc: Beautiful but deadly, a genetically engineered cyborg constructed to seduce and then murder a rival technology company's CEO betrays her programming by falling in love with one of her trainers and escaping the confines of the laboratory where she was created. Angelina Jolie stars in this sci-fi action thriller with Elias Koteas, Jack Palance and Billy Drago

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: BRAND: A Second Coming
programme.desc: Documentary charting controversial comedian Russell Brand's journey from being a troubled youth in Essex to a Hollywood star, hooked on drugs, sex and fame until his unexpected evolution into a political activist

programme.title: Lance Armstrong: Stop at Nothing
programme.desc: An intimate documentary about the explosive story of cyclist Lance Armstrong, revealing a portrait of a man who will stop at nothing in the pursuit of money, fame and success. Features candid interviews with his friends and enemies to reveal the truth behind the greatest fraud in sporting history

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: Hidalgo
programme.desc: Based on the true story of the greatest long-distance horse race ever run, this epic action-adventure set in 1890 follows a down-and-out cowboy who travels to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross-desert horse race. Stars Viggo Mortensen and Omar Sharif

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.title: Brad Williams: Fun Size
programme.desc: Hilarious stand-up comedy special featuring energetic comedian Brad Williams' inimitable take on disability, relationships, sex and race with perfect timing and explosive delivery that proves that you can in fact overcome any shortcomings... pun intended

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: The Last One
programme.desc: A documentary uncovering the birth of The AIDS Memorial Quilt, which became a galvanizing force against bigotry and a flag in the fight for a cure. This moving story explores the quest to sew on the last panel, representing the final death and an end to the disease. Features archival footage, vérité scenes and interviews with the quilt makers and activists

programme.title: Dragonheart
programme.desc: A story of allegiance between a man of honor and a creature of legend - the very last dragon. Dennis Quaid stars as a knight who, with his companion, an 18-foot high dragon (voiced by Sean Connery), join forces in a heroic battle to free a country from the iron grip of its tyrannical ruler

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar

programme.title: The Bear
programme.desc: This unique tale with minimal dialogue and sweeping cinematography is set in 19-century British Columbia and follows a live cub and adult grizzly bear as they join forces to survive the perils of their mountain habitat

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island
programme.desc: In this sequel, Nim, the precocious daughter of a scientist, still has her gift of being one with nature but now that developers and poachers threaten her island, she and her father must fight to preserve their pristine home and its abundant wildlife. Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Tears and Tortillas
programme.desc: A Mexican grandmother is miraculously reunited with a long-lost love while making tortillas in this charming short from filmmaker Xochitl Dorsey

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In this futuristic tale where human frequencies determine luck, love, and destiny, a young college student must overcome science in order to love a woman who emits a different frequency than his own

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

Bernie Mac, Kimberly Elise and Tom Arnold costar in this inspiring drama

programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Lovesick
programme.desc: Matt LeBlanc stars in this comic tale as a man who has everything going for him, except love - which sends him clinically insane the moment he falls for someone. With the help of his friends and his wacky neighbor, he must find a way to overcome his psychosis to claim his chance at true love. Also stars Chevy Chase

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.desc: Documentary that reveals Hollywood legend Marlon Brando entirely in his own words -- through exclusive access to the actor's extraordinary personal archive of unseen film footage and unheard audio recordings, comprising the definitive story of one of the most complex and influential actors of all time

programme.desc: A comedy of errors about an unlikely couple, who are thrown together by their respective best friends and do everything they can to not fall for each other

Meryl Streep, Jon Voight, Kimberly Elise, Jeffrey Wright and Vera Farmiga co-star in this taut thriller

programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar

programme.title: Six Days Seven Nights
programme.desc: Romantic comedy starring Anne Heche and Harrison Ford as a New York magazine editor and a gruff pilot who must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island

programme.title: Up in the Air
programme.desc: Academy Award® winner George Clooney stars in this dramatic comedy as a corporate downsizing expert whose cherished life on the road, without commitments, is threatened just when he's on the cusp of achieving his frequent flying dreams. Also stars Anna Kendrick

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Hilary Swank stars in this drama about an idealistic California teacher who assigns her at-risk students in a gang-infested high school to writer journals that chronicle their troubled lives. Patrick Dempsey, Imelda Staunton and Scott Glenn costar

Martin Landau is the sleazy producer who introduces Wuhl to Robert De Niro, Danny Aiello and Eli Wallach - three guys with money who are willing to invest in the movie. There's just one catch: each one wants his girlfriend to be the star. Putting the deal together and keeping the mistress happy turns into a hilarious expose of the truth about Hollywood

programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene

programme.desc: Witness for the Defense. When her friend is charged with murder, Jessica is summoned to Quebec to serve as a witness for the defence

programme.title: Hart to Hart
programme.desc: To Coin a Hart. Jennifer obtains a coin that some people are willing to kill for. Laura: Patricia Davis. Jennifer: Stefanie Powers. Rollins: Richard Bradford. Jonathan: Robert Wagner. Chambers: Scott Hylands

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Brothers. Matlock (Andy Griffith) has to provide double the defense when he discovers his client (Kristoffer Tabori) is an identical twin. Doreen Ferguson: Barbara Whinnery. Lori Atwood: Ann Marie Lee. William Hodges: Robert Miano. Ellie Stanford: Patricia Heaton

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: The Cover Girl. Conrad (Clarence Gilyard Jr.) asks Matlock to find out whether a trio of fashion models is covering up the murder of their agent. Carla Royce: Shari Headley. Lauren Chadwick: Amy Yasbeck. Bobby Michaelson: Paul Lieber. Frannie Morrisey: Lisa Waltz

programme.desc: A Friend in Deed. A man becomes a suspect when he helps a desperate neighbour who has killed his wife. Unfortunately for Columbo, the suspect is the chief of police

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: How to Murder Your Lawyer. Dr. Sloan helps a paralegal and a lawyer unravel a plot involving a dead labour attorney

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder

programme.desc: Neighbors form an unusual arrangement to share custody of a dog, and the pair soon find themselves falling for one another

programme.desc: If It's Thursday, It Must Be Beverly. The murder of a sad and bitter housewife, made to look like a suicide, casts suspicion on her long-suffering husband, who has a pussycat demeanor and the heart of a tomcat. Jessica: Angela Lansbury. Jonathan Martin: Rick Lenz. Loretta Spiegel: Ruth Roman. George Tibbits: Ray Girardin

programme.title: Wall Street
programme.desc: (1987) Oliver Stone's morality tale stars Charlie Sheen as Bud Fox, an ambitious young stockbroker, who's willing to do whatever it takes to emulate his hero, supremely wealthy financier Gordon Gekko (Michael Douglas). Bud's initial attempts to play the market honestly don't light his touchpaper to success. But, when he passes on some insider information to Gekko, his career starts to pick up pace and, as he becomes increasingly embroiled in illegal trading and financial espionage, he begins to make the money of his dreams. However, he fails to fully comprehend the true cost of his deals until one of them threatens the livelihood of his union boss father (Martin Sheen). Also starring Daryl Hannah and Terence Stamp. programme.title: The Mistress of Spices
programme.desc: Director Paul Mayeda Berges adapts author Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni magic realist tale about an enchanting Indian orphan who has leaned to harness the magical properties of spices. Orphaned by regional strife in her homeland of India, Tilo (Aishwarya Rai) is subsequently kidnapped by a vicious gang of bandits. A daring escape is quick to follow, and soon after washing up on mysterious shores the traumatized girl is sheltered by a benevolent old woman (Zohra Segal) who reveals to her the remarkable powers of common spices. Later, after moving to Oakland, California and opening her own spice shop, Tilo is compelled to follow three strict stipulations is she is to retain her ability to harness these magnificent powers: she must never use the powers for her own gain, she can never venture outside of her store, and she must never make contact with the skin of another person. When a handsome architect (Dylan McDermott) crashes his motorcycle just outside of the shop and the kindly proprietor rushes to his aid, the instant chemistry between the pair soon finds Tilo's resolve put to the ultimate test(n)

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: A teen finds himself at the centre of a battle to save Earth from transforming alien robots in this blockbuster based on the popular toys(n)

programme.title: Real Sports With Bryant Gumbel
programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio(n)

programme.title: The Score
programme.desc: Three generations of method acting giants unite for this crime thriller written by Kario Salem and directed by Frank Oz. Robert De Niro stars as Nick Wells, an aging thief whose specialty is safecracking and who is on the verge of retiring to a life of ease, running his jazz club and romancing his girlfriend Diane (Angela Bassett). But before he can ride off into the sunset, Nick is pressured to do one last job by his mentor and business partner, a flamboyant and extravagant upscale fence named Max (Marlon Brando). Max is plotting the heist of the Montreal Customs House, and he's got a man on the inside, Jackie Teller (Edward Norton), a talented but volatile crook who has managed to ingratiate himself with the facility's staff as a fellow employee suffering from cerebral palsy. Jackie bristles at Nick's interference in "his" score, however, and threatens violence when it seems he's going to be cut out of the action. In the meantime, Nick grows increasingly ill at ease about the operation, as it violates his two most important dictums in thievery: always work alone and never pull a job in your own city. The part of Max in The Score was written specifically for Brando by screenwriter Salem, although the improvisational star and his director Oz reportedly clashed during filming(n)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: (2008) Doug Liman's sci-fi thriller stars Hayden Christensen as David Rice, a 'jumper', who can teleport anywhere instantly. He uses his powers to accumulate the wealth for an ideal lifestyle, but finds himself threatened by the Paladins, a shadowy organisation led by Roland (Samuel Jackson), who are dedicated to tracking down and killing jumpers. Rice teams up with fellow jumper Griffin (Jamie Bell) to take on the Paladins and to save his sweetheart Millie (Rachel Billson), who has become an innocent pawn in the battle. Network premiere. Premiere HD Wide(n)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: For the right price, ex-Special Forces officer Frank Martin will take anything anywhere. He just has three rules: no changes to the plan; no real names; no opening the package... until one package starts to move. Inside it is the beautiful Lai and, although Martin delivers her to the unscrupulous Darren "Wall Street" Bettencourt, his conscience soon gets the better of him and he decides to track down Wall Street and his masters and rescue Lai…(n)

programme.title: Furious 7
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a tight-knit gang of street racers must battle the brother of a defeated nemesis and rescue a software genius from terrorists. The film is dedicated to series regular Paul Walker, who died halfway through production(n)

programme.desc: A look at "Jason Bourne," a 2016 thriller based on novelist Robert Ludlum's character, and the fifth installment in the series. The film stars Matt Damon, Julia Stiles and Tommy Lee Jones, and is directed by Paul Greengrass(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Insurgent
programme.desc: Tris and Four seek refuge outside of the city with the Amity faction. They convene with other Divergents and exiled survivors, and plot to fight back against the warmongering Dauntless and despot Jeanine Matthews(n)

programme.desc: All-star heist sequel. The remaining members of Danny Ocean's gang regroup to jeopardise the nefarious plans of a businessman who double-crossed one of Danny's old friends. The team plan to ruin the opening of his glitzy Las Vegas casino and hotel by rigging the games and ensuring that every punter goes home with a jackpot(n)

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: A hardened soldier of the future is abandoned on a remote planet when a new breed of genetically engineered warriors is introduced(n)

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies

Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer(n)

Facing eviction from the hotel where they live, the guys try to scare off the owners with a staged shooting. But the plan backfires, and a hilarious comedy of errors begins. Phillippe plays an FBI trainee who is assigned to keep an eye on a fellow agent (Cooper) suspected of selling information to the Soviets. The film is based on the life of convicted spy Robert Hanssen. Directed by Billy Ray ("Shattered Glass"), who co-wrote the script with Adam Mazer and William Rotko. His life is transformed when he is chosen as a wild card to play at Wimbledon, where he meets and falls in love with an attractive young American on the women's circuit. Their love match spurs him on to reach the tournament final, but will his good fortune hold out long enough for him to lift the prestigious trophy?
