Truly an intellectual, Igby is a modern day Holden Caulfield of "Catcher in the Rye". Unfortunately the world he lives in is far away from the high expectations he holds for it(r)

programme.title: Brewster's Millions
programme.desc: Much to his amazement, third-rate baseball player Montgomery Brewster discovers that he is related to deceased millionaire Rupert Horn. Even more amazing is the fact that Horn has left Brewster his entire $300 million fortune. The catch? Brewster must spend $30 million within 30 days, or he'll be left with nothing(r)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: A hilariously criminal Santa finds a measure of holiday redemption when he befriends a troubled kid. The traditional Christmas tale will never be the same after this cleverly twisted, merrily irreverent story of a Santa so bad that he's funny. Billy Bob Thornton stars (in a Golden Globe-nominated role) as Willie T. Stokes, a washed-up, wisecracking department store Santa who is only in the business for the criminal opportunities. Every Christmas Eve this Santa and his ingenious Elf' Willie's midget partner-in-crime Marcus (Tony Cox), crack the store safe and make off with their own holiday stash. But this year Santa and his Elf find their annual heist endangered by a pesky store manager (John Ritter), a savvy mall detective (Bernie Mac), a sexy Santa fan (Lauren Graham) and an 8-year-old misfit (Brett Kelly) who decides to believe that Willie: intoxicated, acid-tongued and felonious as he is, is the real Santa(r)

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy concerning four high-school friends who vow to lose their virginity by prom night(r)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Follow-up to the hit comedy Bruce Almighty. God appears before a sceptical congressman to tell him that his destiny is to be the modern-day Noah and build an ark capable of withstanding a mighty flood. While the congressman initially struggles to come to terms with his task and begins to question his own sanity, he soon finds himself gathering animals, chopping wood and trying to convince his disbelieving family(r)

He is left with no choice but to become a professional party organiser on campus. When an intrepid student reporter writes an unflattering article about him, the young man sets out to prove her wrong, falling in love with her along the way(r)

programme.title: Iceman
programme.desc: A prehistoric hunter, discovered frozen in the Arctic, is revived by doctors. Some scientists want to dissect him but others hope to learn to communicate with him, and in so doing discover what life was truly like for our Neanderthal ancestors(n)

programme.title: Graduating Peter
programme.desc: The life of Peter Gwazdauskas, a student with Down syndrome, is chronicled from sixth grade through high-school graduation. Gerardine Wurzburg directed this follow-up to her Oscar-winning 1992 short "Educating Peter."(n)

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: Madcap creatures The Muppets lend their very special talents to a very different version of a much-loved Christmas classic, Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol - with the help of some humans. Michael Caine plays Scrooge alongside Kermit the Frog as Bob Cratchit and Miss Piggy, who gives an unforgettable performance as Emily Cratchit. It's one of the great stories set in the festive season, with its ghosts of Christmasses past, present and future, and the Muppets make it their own in inimitable style. A Christmas cracker!(n)

programme.title: Happily Ever After: Fairy Tales for Every Child
programme.desc: Puss in Boots. Set in a Hawaiian village, David Hyde Pierce gives voice to "Puss in Boots," and Dean Cain does the vocals of a troubled young prince who seeks his help. Also: Pat Morita as King Makahana(n)

programme.title: Coraline
programme.desc: Director Henry Selick (The Nightmare Before Christmas; James and the Giant Peach) delivers a deliciously dark stop-motion animated adventure for children who don't mind a scare or two, based on Neil Gaiman's much-praised book. Coraline Jones and her parents have just moved into the Pink Palaces Apartments in Oregon, where they find themselves surrounded by eccentric neighbours, including a pair of ageing burlesque performers. It should be an exciting time, but Coraline's parents are too busy working as horticultural journalists to spend any time with her, so she is deeply bored. That is until she discovers a mysterious door that only appears after dark. Bold and inquisitive, the youngster investigates. She discovers a brightly coloured alternative universe, where her 'Other Mother' has plenty of time to play with her and her neighbours' quirks are charmingly exaggerated; in fact, she's tempted to stay. But all is not as it seems: everyone in the new world has buttons for eyes - and the operation to install them involves knitting needles. And that revelation is just the first of her shocking discoveries about the true nature of her apparent idyll... So, there's definitely good reason for that PG certificate, though children who can cope with the story of Hansel and Gretel shouldn't find anything too disturbing here. Selick's film won great critical acclaim, and scooped festival prizes around the world, as well as picking up an Oscar nomination and winning the 2009 BAFTA Children's Award. Also featuring the voices of Keith David, Robert Bailey Jr and Ian McShane(n)

programme.title: Camp Nowhere
programme.desc: Rebellious teens faced with a boring summer at camp enlist a teacher to trick their parents and create a fantasy getaway(n)

programme.title: Chimps: So Like Us
programme.desc: As the world's foremost authority on chimpanzees, Jane Goodall is the ideal guide in this heartwarming documentary. The remarkable similarity between humans and chimpanzees is apparent from the opening of the film in the lush forest on the shores of Lake Tanganyika. Here the chimpanzees live -- much like humans -- in family units, make tools, and express complex emotions. Love, jealousy, friendship, and war are all presented, and further blur the distinctions between human and animal. In contrast, the film reveals the shocking conditions under which chimps suffer in research labs. Produced for HBO, Chimps is informative and beautiful, while also being quite strong in its conviction that chimpanzees deserve to live freely in their natural habitat(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: In this thrilling and action-packed entry, Harry enters his fifth year at Hogwarts and forms a group with his friends called "Dumbledore's Army" to defend themselves against the Dark Arts(n)

programme.title: Hoot
programme.desc: Wil Shriner's family film, based on Carl Hiaasen's novel, stars Logan Lerman as Roy Eberhardt, who, thanks to his father's job, is at his eighth school in six years, this time in Florida. There, he makes friends with Beatrice and Mullet Fingers. Mullet is involved in low-level sabotage to stop a chain restaurant building on a nesting site used by rare burrowing owls and the other two join his in his eco-battle against inept contractor Curly and his greedy boss Muckle(n)

programme.title: The Manhattan Project

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Director Brian De Palma returns to the helm for the first time since 2002's Femme Fatale with this stylish screen adaptation of James Ellroy's novel detailing one of the most notorious unsolved murders in Hollywood history. Elizabeth Short (Mia Kirshner) was a struggling actress looking to make a name for herself in 1940s-era Tinseltown. Unfortunately for Elizabeth, it was her grim fate that would ultimately overshadow anything she would accomplish during her short and tragic career. When police discover Elizabeth's body cut clean in half and with all of her organs missing, ex-pugilist detectives Lee Blanchard (Aaron Eckhart) and Bucky Bleichert (Josh Hartnett) are the men charged with cracking the case and apprehending the killer. This isn't your average murder case, however, and as Blanchard's marriage to Kay (Scarlett Johansson) begins to suffer due to his obsession with the sensational crime, his partner Bleichert discovers a troubling link between the victim and the mysterious Madeleine Linscott (Hilary Swank), a prominent socialite and the daughter of one of the town's most connected key players

programme.title: Making of 'Furious 7'
programme.desc: A look at "Furious 7," a 2015 thriller about a man seeking revenge on the Toretto gang for the death of his brother. The film stars Vin Diesel, Paul Walker and Jason Statham, and is directed by James Wan

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss

programme.title: Take the Lead
programme.desc: Liz Friedlander's feelgood movie, based on a real-life story, stars Antonio Banderas as Pierre Dulaine, a dance teacher who takes it upon himself to improve the behaviour of the pupils of an inner city school by teaching them ballroom dancing. Facing their expected reluctance, he gets them on side by demonstrating the sensuality of the tango and soon, even the most rebellious class members, including Rock, are tangoing and fox-trotting in preparation for the big dance competition that is looming(r)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(r)

programme.title: Saving Grace
programme.desc: Two-time Oscar nominee Brenda Blethyn ("Secrets & Lies") is a delight as a respectable Englishwoman who's plunged into debt after the death of her irresponsible husband. To raise money, she and her gardener cultivate a real cash crop---marijuana. It's a joint venture that just might save her country estate. Craig Ferguson, Martin Clunes(r)

programme.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
programme.desc: A delightful romantic comedy about a woman who becomes so disillusioned with dating men that she decides to answer a personal ad that was written by another woman. When the two meet, a tentative, awkward romance ensues(r)

programme.title: Spaceballs
programme.desc: Mel Brooks offers his irreverent and rollicking take on Star Wars and other sci-fi epics in this goofy comedy. The story features such characters as the princess Vespa, her nemesis Dark Helmet, and her hero Lone Starr(r)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retired successful business owner and widower (Robert De Niro) lands an internship at a fashion website run by a young, career-driven woman (Anne Hathaway) in this Warner Bros. comedy from writer/director Nancy Meyers (The Holiday, It's Complicated)(r)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: In this millennial screwball comedy, Tracy (Lola Kirke), a mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke (Greta Gerwig), her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature. Written and Directed by Noah Baumbach(r)

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy(r)

programme.title: Fantastic Four
programme.desc: A brilliant scientist builds a device that allows users to teleport to an alternate dimension, but an experiment involving it goes wrong and leaves him and his three teammates with unusual superpowers. The quartet are then forced to work together to battle an enemy from their past(r)

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: A retired successful business owner and widower (Robert De Niro) lands an internship at a fashion website run by a young, career-driven woman (Anne Hathaway) in this Warner Bros. comedy from writer/director Nancy Meyers (The Holiday, It's Complicated)(r)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: In this millennial screwball comedy, Tracy (Lola Kirke), a mousy college freshman living on her own in New York City meets Brooke (Greta Gerwig), her stepsister-to-be, and is soon entranced by her worldliness and flummoxed by her impulsive nature. Written and Directed by Noah Baumbach(r)

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: (2008) Doug Liman's sci-fi thriller stars Hayden Christensen as David Rice, a 'jumper', who can teleport anywhere instantly. He uses his powers to accumulate the wealth for an ideal lifestyle, but finds himself threatened by the Paladins, a shadowy organisation led by Roland (Samuel Jackson), who are dedicated to tracking down and killing jumpers. Rice teams up with fellow jumper Griffin (Jamie Bell) to take on the Paladins and to save his sweetheart Millie (Rachel Billson), who has become an innocent pawn in the battle. Network premiere. Premiere HD Wide(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Will Smith plays heavyweight champion Muhammad Ali in Michael Mann's biopic, which chronicles the boxer's life from 1964 to '74(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Murray Takes It to the Next Level
programme.desc: Murray Takes It to the Next Level. Mel wants Bret to apologize for his behavior in a dream; Murray focuses on his personal relationship with the band. Jim Gaffigan guest stars(n)

programme.title: Broad Street Bullies
programme.desc: Documentary on the Philadelphia Flyers of the 1970s and the aggressive style of play that won them back-to-back Stanley Cups. Beloved in their home city and despised elsewhere, the Flyers were one of the most polarizing champions in sports. Among those interviewed are Bobby Clarke; Bill Barber; Dave Schultz; Bill Clement; and Gary Dornhoefer(n)

programme.title: Cursed
programme.desc: "Scream" director Wes Craven and writer Kevin Williamson reunite for this bloodcurdling chiller. It's the story of siblings (Christina Ricci, Jesse Eisenberg) who are bitten by a mysterious beast, then gradually turn into werewolves. Can they break the deadly curse? Scott Baio and Craig Kilborn have cameos. Joshua Jackson, Portia de Rossi, Shannon Elizabeth, Mya, Kristina Anapau(n)

programme.title: Shutter
programme.desc: A newly married couple discovers disturbing, ghostly images in photographs they develop after a tragic accident. Fearing the manifestations may be connected, they investigate and learn that some mysteries are better left unsolved(n)

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: In this action-packed, special effect-filled super production, horrifying legendary creatures challenge the brave monster hunter Van Helsing (Hugh Jackman, X-Men). It all starts when Count Dracula (Richard Roxburgh) decides to use Dr. Victor Frankenstein's invention to create a legion of vampires. In order to do so, he needs to absorb the energy only the Werewolf can generate. To stop the experiment, the Vatican sends Van Helsing to Transylvania. There, together with Anna Valerious (Kate Beckinsale, Pearl Harbor) - whose family has been fighting the forces of evil for decades - he will face the terrifying monsters. The film was directed by the talented Stephen Sommers (The Mummy, The Mummy Returns)(n)

programme.title: The Last Castle
programme.desc: Robert Redford stars in this action drama as General Irwin, a respected three-star tactician whose career ends in disgrace when he's court-martialled and sent to The Castle, a maximum security military prison. Irwin quickly butts heads with the facility's autocratic warden, Colonel Winter, who runs his command with an iron fist, even killing prisoners when he deems it necessary. Irwin rallies his fellow convicts into a rag-tag army and leads them in a revolt against Winter, an action that the warden is ready to repel by violent means(n)

programme.title: Kung Pow: Enter the Fist
programme.desc: The Chosen One was orphaned at birth by villainous Master Pain. Fully grown (he was raised by rodents), he stalks the Earth in search of his enemy for one last karate showdown. Martial arts spoof inserting comedy dubbing over a cheesy 70s Hong Kong fight flick(n)

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: A New York drug dealer is pursued by a determined cop(n)

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: Comedy spoof of teen high school movies from the last 20 years, in which a dim sportsman vows to transform an ugly girl into the prom queen. Parodied films include She's All That, The Breakfast Club, Risky Business and American Pie(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A Trusty Steed. A school evaluator's arrival rattles Gamby and Russell, who cross boundaries with Dr. Brown(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: A Walk Among the Tombstones
programme.desc: A New York City heroin trafficker hires a haunted ex-cop to find the men who abducted and killed his wife. But as the sleuth gets closer to his targets, he realizes that they're much more sinister than he could have imagined(n)

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride set in a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: PT Anderson assembles a remarkable cast for this striking drama that follows the broken lives of several LA residents

programme.title: Connie and Carla
programme.desc: Nia Vardalos ("My Big Fat Greek Wedding") wrote and stars in this cheery musical farce. She and Toni Collette play two struggling Chicago singers who pose as drag performers in L.A. after they witness a mob hit in Chicago. David Duchovny, Stephen Spinella, Alec Mapa

programme.title: Trouble With the Curve
programme.desc: An ailing baseball scout is given one last chance to prove his competence - and to reconnect with his daughter - on a scouting trip to North Carolina. Drama

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: The Barden Bellas are back, determined to enter (and win) an international competition. After a disasterous performance elsewhere, the Bellas have much more to prove if they want to become the best

programme.title: Making of 'Pitch Perfect 2'
programme.desc: A look at "Pitch Perfect 2," a 2015 musical comedy about a collegiate a cappella group that enters an international competition no U.S. team has ever won. The sequel to the 2012 film stars Anna Kendrick, Skylar Astin and Rebel Wilson, and is directed by Elizabeth Banks

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Duncan Tucker's film stars Oscar-nominated, Golden Globe-winner Felicity Huffman as Sabrina 'Bree' Osbourne, a man who is preparing to undergo the final part of sex change surgery. Until her therapist, who can authorise the final operation, drops a bombshell. As Stanley, she fathered a son, Toby, who is now a teenage male prostitute and in trouble with the law. Before Bree can have the final operation, she must meet up with him and resolve both his problems and her feelings. Bailing him out in New York, she agrees to drive him to L.A. and on the road, they learn about each other as Toby tries to accept both his father... and his mother

programme.title: The Great Santini
programme.desc: A great, but immature marine pilot builds character in his family by ordering them around like a commander, putting them through drills and hounding his sensitive eldest son. Based on actual events

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: An elderly couple in Nepal blinded by cataracts are given the opportunity to see again thanks to a simple surgery, but first they must be convinced to take the long journey to a clinic

programme.title: American Splendor
programme.desc: Harvey Pekar (Paul Giamatti) is a hospital clerk who loves jazz and is in a slightly depressive relationship with Hope Davis. But he becomes famous through his friendship with cartoonist Robert Crumb (James Urbaniak), who takes Harvey's stickman-illustrated musings on his everyday life and turns them into one of America's most successful cult comic books. Shari Springer Berman and Robert Pulcini's film mixes drama, animation and interjections from the real-life Pekar in this genuinely unique Oscar-nominated, Sundance-winning comedy-drama

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Enter the Temple. Spencer pursues a big client who's already represented by a powerful rival; Ricky mulls his next move; Tracy lobbies for a bigger role at work; Reggie feels undervalued by Vernon

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Electrifying chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Duncan Tucker's film stars Oscar-nominated, Golden Globe-winner Felicity Huffman as Sabrina 'Bree' Osbourne, a man who is preparing to undergo the final part of sex change surgery. Until her therapist, who can authorise the final operation, drops a bombshell. As Stanley, she fathered a son, Toby, who is now a teenage male prostitute and in trouble with the law. Before Bree can have the final operation, she must meet up with him and resolve both his problems and her feelings. Bailing him out in New York, she agrees to drive him to L.A. and on the road, they learn about each other as Toby tries to accept both his father... and his mother

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: An elderly couple in Nepal blinded by cataracts are given the opportunity to see again thanks to a simple surgery, but first they must be convinced to take the long journey to a clinic

programme.title: The Great Santini
programme.desc: A great, but immature marine pilot builds character in his family by ordering them around like a commander, putting them through drills and hounding his sensitive eldest son. Based on actual events

programme.title: As Above, So Below
programme.desc: In this horrifying tale of psychological torment, a group of subterranean explorers encounter terror in the ancient catacombs beneath Paris. As their journey becomes a nightmare, demons from their past strike back with a vengeance

programme.title: Frailty
programme.desc: Actor Bill Paxton made his directorial debut with Frailty. The bulk of the story is told through flashbacks, as a mysterious man (Matthew McConaughey) tells a terrible tale to an FBI agent (Powers Boothe) investigating the "God's Hand" serial killer case. The man grew up in a small town in Texas, where he and his brother lived a bucolic life with their kindhearted widower father (Paxton). One night, the father awakens the two boys, Fenton (Matthew O'Leary) and Adam (Jeremy Sumpter), and tells them he's had a vision, and God has chosen him and his sons to help Him slay demons who walk the earth in human form. He tells the boys they can never tell anyone about this task. Before long, he comes home from work with a list of names that he claims an angel has given to him. He then begins abducting people, bringing them home, one by one, and having the boys watch while he lays his hands on them. After having proven, to his mind, that they are demons and not human, he chops them up with an axe while the boys look on. Young Adam is eager to participate, seeing his family as "kind of like superheroes," while the older Fenton is distraught, believing that his father has lost his mind. He contemplates running away, but is reluctant to leave his little brother behind. Eventually, he goes to the authorities, which results in disaster. As he tells the story, McConaughey takes Boothe out to the public rose garden near his old home, where he claims his brother, the "God's Hand" killer, buried the bodies. Paxton dramatizes the mayhem while leaving almost all of the gore offscreen, and Brent Hanley's script leaves the true motives of several characters unclear until the very end

programme.title: El Beso
programme.desc: A man asks his platonic female friend for an analysis of his kissing style, but his pal is skeptical of the idea

programme.title: Georgia Rule
programme.desc: Jane Fonda, Felicity Huffman, and Lindsay Lohan star in director Garry Marshall's tale of a rebellious young woman who is sent to spend the summer with her grandmother when her frustrated mother fails to find a means of curbing her unruly behavior. Rachel (Lohan) is an out-of-control teen whose reckless drinking, foul mouth, and hysterical fits have become a constant source of embarrassment for her long-suffering mother, Lily (Huffman). When Rachel crashes her car, Lily determines that the only way to tame her savage daughter is to take her as far away from San Francisco as possible. Though Lily had once sworn never to return to the Idaho farm presided over by her demanding mother, Georgia (Jane Fonda), desperation has a funny way of dulling the pains of the past, and it's not long before Lily is packing Rachel in the car and setting out for potato country. Contrary to the common image of the sweet and doting grandmother, Georgia is a stern matriarch whose beliefs in the power of God and a hard day's work stand in stark contrast to the carefree lifestyle of the tempestuous Rachel. An interesting thing happens as the summer wears on, though; despite her initial efforts to disrupt the quiet Mormon community, Rachel's rage is gradually tempered as she learns the value of structure and responsibility. Later, as Rachel's protective walls begin to crumble and she begins to embrace compassion and kindness, the doors are opened for three generations of family to confront the long-buried secrets of their past and finally move forward in the healing process

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Jerry Shaw and Rachel Holloman were complete strangers at the beginning of the day, but that changed the instant a strange woman called to threaten both their lives and the lives of their loved ones. Suddenly forced into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, Jerry and Rachel must now take orders from a woman who's using everyday technology to track and control their every move

programme.title: San Andreas
programme.desc: In this high-octane thrill ride, a helicopter pilot races to rescue his daughter and estranged wife as a series of massive earthquakes devastate California. Meanwhile, a Cal Tech professor attempts to warn other citizens

programme.title: Beauty Shop
programme.desc: Gina Norris is a long way from the Barbershop - she's moved from Chicago to Atlanta so her daughter can attend a prestigious music school, and she's made a name for herself at a posh salon with her cutting-edge hairstyles. But when her egotistical boss takes credit for her work, she leaves the salon with the shampoo girl in tow to open a shop of her own. Gina buys a rundown salon and inherits a motley group of headstrong stylists, a colorful clientele, and a sexy piano-playing electrician. It's a rocky road to fulfilling her dreams, but you can't keep a good woman down

programme.title: My Life in Ruins
programme.desc: A harried Greek tour guide (Nia Vardalos) leads a ragtag group of tourists around Greece with hilarious results in this winning sun-soaked comedy from director Donald Petrie. Along the way, she manages to open their eyes to the wonders of an exotic land, while she herself begins to see the world in a new light. Richard Dreyfuss, Harland Williams, Rachel Dratch

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Young Greek student Nia Vardalos causes uproar in her exuberant but traditional family when she brings home non-Greek new man John Corbett

programme.title: How to Let Go of the World and Love All the Things Climate Can't Change
programme.desc: A look at communities around the world that have been harshly impacted by the effects of climate change. This in-depth documentary also spotlights inspiring efforts to create a greener, more-sustainable existence

programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: A single woman who has served as a bridesmaid a shocking 27 times wrestles with the prospect of supporting her sister at the altar on number 28, despite having fallen helplessly in love with her smitten sibling's handsome husband-to-be. Jane (Katherine Heigl) has the kind of altruistic traits that everyone looks for in a friend, yet lately the perennial bridesmaid has begun to feel as if something is missing in her life. One night, local newspaper reporter Kevin (James Marsden) spots the devoted bridal attendant racing between receptions in Manhattan and Brooklyn, and quickly surmises that her quirky tale may be just the story to get him off the bridal beat and into the big time. Immediately suspicious of the cynical reporter's motivations, Jane butts heads with Kevin just as her younger sister Tess (Malin Akerman) shows up in town. While Jane has always put the needs of friends and family before her own wants and desires, she's suddenly prompted to reevaluate her priorities when her boss -- with whom she is secretly in love -- falls for her younger sister Tess. When Tess and Jane's boss George (Edward Burns) make plans to marry, the smitten younger sibling mistakenly assumes that her lovelorn older sibling will be happy to take part in the wedding. For as far back as Jane can remember, she has sacrificed her own happiness for the sake of those she holds dearest, but now that her heart has been broken, she's finally found the courage to be honest with herself. Now, as Jane finally comes to terms with her true feelings, her life begins to change in ways she never expected. Judy Greer and Melora Hardin co-star in a romantic comedy scripted by The Devil Wears Prada screenwriter Aline Brosh McKenna and directed by Anne Fletcher (Step Up)

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: A psychic facilitates a dead banker's return to protect his girlfriend from the man who murdered him

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: Nicholas Sparks' best-selling novel comes to the big screen in this romantic drama from director George Tillman Jr.. The plot centers on the star-crossed love affair between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle, and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an aging man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration. Scott Eastwood, Britt Robertson, Jack Huston, and Alan Alda star

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day(n)

programme.title: Born Killers
programme.desc: Two brothers who make their living through murder and theft find that their work gets harder when they tangle with an intelligent young woman in this dark thriller. Siblings John (Jake Muxworthy) and Michael (Gabriel Mann) were raised by their father (Tom Sizemore), a psychopath who drifted from town to town, killing people and taking their homes and belongings when he ran low on money. John and Michael traveled with their dad, and have grown up to follow in his footsteps, though while Michael enjoys his work and takes particular pleasure in raping and murdering women, John has less enthusiasm for violence and prefers to kill only when the circumstances demand it, without developing a close connection with his victims. John and Michael's ways take a disquieting turn when they abduct Archer (Kelli Garner), a clever and attractive young woman whom both men fall for. This situation begins to deeply trouble John, and his half-sister, Gertie (Lauren German), suggests that it's time he gave up his life of crime, though it soon becomes clear she has motives of her own(n)

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: Roman leader Tiberius (Adrien Brody) is intent on conquering the Silk Road region with his rogue army and it's up to an unlikely alliance between Roman general Lucius (John Cusack) and Chinese warrior Huo An (Jackie Chan) to gather the soldiers of 36 nations together to defeat him(n)

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: Oscar winning drama with an uptight writer embarking on a life-changing adventure with Alexis Zorba, the gregarious musician he meets on a business trip to Greece(n)

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: An underprivileged Cinderella chooses between two prom dates: a charming preppy and a disarming buddy(n)

programme.title: Don't Say a Word
programme.desc: This psychological thriller from screenwriter Patrick Smith Kelly reunites him with his A Perfect Murder (1998) star Michael Douglas. Dr. Nathan Conrad (Douglas) is a respected adolescent therapist faced with a nightmarish scenario when his young daughter (Skye McCole Bartusiak) is snatched by Koster (Sean Bean), a criminal with a talent for high-tech surveillance. Conrad learns that the kidnapper is desperate for a critical piece of information known only to Elisabeth Burrows (Brittany Murphy), one of his catatonic pro bono patients. While his wife Aggie (Famke Janssen) remains at home, bedridden due to a broken leg, Conrad races to unlock the secret stored in Elisabeth's fractured mind, while a New York City detective (Jennifer Esposito) inches closer to discovering the Conrads' dilemma. Don't Say a Word co-stars Oliver Platt and Guy Torry and is directed by Gary Fleder, who follows up his suspense smash Kiss the Girls (1997)(n)

programme.title: Paradise Road
programme.desc: Fact-based recounting of a group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II and used music as a relief to their misery(n)

programme.title: 5 Flights Up
programme.desc: When an elderly couple discover that their Brooklyn apartment has increased in value, they decide to sell and move to Manhattan. However, they soon learn that relocating won't be easy(n)

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights
programme.desc: Elizabeth has just been through a particularly nasty break-up, and now she's ready to leave her friends and memories behind as she chases her dreams across the U.S. In order to support herself on her journey, Elizabeth picks up a series of waitress jobs along the way. As Elizabeth crosses paths with a series of lost souls whose yearnings are even greater than her own -- including a troubled cop , his estranged wife, and an embittered gambler -- their emotional turmoil ultimately helps her gain a greater understanding of her own problems(n)

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: Ken Scott's comedy Unfinished Business stars Vince Vaughn as a struggling businessman trying to get his fledgling company off the ground. To do so he must travel with his partners (Dave Franco and Tom Wilkinson) on a foreign business trip in order to land a huge client. Unexpectedly, our hero discovers that he is competing against his former boss, and his attempts to show the prospective clients the best night of their lies leads to a number of unexpected complications(n)

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Former covert operative Bryan Mills must race to protect his daughter while tracking down the criminals who framed him for killing his ex-wife. Meanwhile, the FBI, the CIA and the police are hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A young suburban girl is abducted by spirits that have besieged her family's home in this terrifying remake of the horror classic. Desperate, her parents devise a plan to rescue her from the other side(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Naomi Watts and Tim Roth star in writer-director Michael Haneke's gripping remake of his acclaimed 1997 Austrian film about a family whose vacation home is invaded by two young men who subject them to a night of psychological and physical torture(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organization. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses
programme.desc: Heavy-metal rocker Rob Zombie made his directorial debut with this clever homage to horror films of the '70s. Shortly after two couples stop at a roadside museum, they're lured into the lair of a family of psychotics led by a demented matriarch (Karen Black). Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon(n)

programme.title: The Hitcher
programme.desc: Remake of the 1986 chiller about a couple who pick up a psychopathic hitchhiker(n)

programme.title: Three O'Clock High
programme.desc: About a wimp (Casey Siemaszko) forced to fight the school bully (Richard Tyson). Brei: Stacey Glick. Franny: Anne Ryan. Phil Joanou directed(n)

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Director Brian Robbins' sci-fi comedy stars Eddie Murphy as both a man-sized humanoid spaceship and the diminutive captain of the same vessel. When a piece of extraterrestrial technology crash-lands in young Josh Morrison's bedroom, he initially thinks it's a meteorite. But it's actually an alien device designed to drain the Earth's oceans and save its home planet from salt-depleted doom. And when it fails its mission, a team of 100 tiny aliens are sent to complete the job, arriving amid a fireball on Liberty Island. Tenacious cop Officer Dooley is soon on their trail, while the alien crew start to mutiny over their plans to totally dehydrate Earth when they discover that the locals are much less primitive than they'd expected. Also starring Elizabeth Banks as Josh's mum Gina(n)

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: Two Manhattan strangers get snowed in together following a one night stand that they both regret(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: A self-destructive divorcée hikes the Pacific Crest Trail in the US in a bid to conquer her demons. As she reflects on her failed marriage and her mother's death, the kindness of strangers helps her summon the courage she'll need to stay the course(n)

programme.title: December Boys
programme.desc: Harry Potter star Daniel Radcliffe stars in this coming of age drama as one of four young orphans who struggle to compete for the attentions of the same family(n)

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The lives of four friends following their involvement in a holdup(n)

programme.title: Win Win
programme.desc: A cash-strapped lawyer (Paul Giamatti) thinks he's found a harmless way to save his business and the fortunes of a school wrestling team(n)

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: A group of friends try to start their own business, but things don't go to plan(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A university student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past. Based on the best-selling novel by E L James(n)

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: In this gruesome tribute to the Italian cannibal films of yesteryear, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a sadistic tribe of flesh-eating locals

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day

programme.title: Born Killers
programme.desc: Two brothers who make their living through murder and theft find that their work gets harder when they tangle with an intelligent young woman in this dark thriller. Siblings John (Jake Muxworthy) and Michael (Gabriel Mann) were raised by their father (Tom Sizemore), a psychopath who drifted from town to town, killing people and taking their homes and belongings when he ran low on money. John and Michael traveled with their dad, and have grown up to follow in his footsteps, though while Michael enjoys his work and takes particular pleasure in raping and murdering women, John has less enthusiasm for violence and prefers to kill only when the circumstances demand it, without developing a close connection with his victims. John and Michael's ways take a disquieting turn when they abduct Archer (Kelli Garner), a clever and attractive young woman whom both men fall for. This situation begins to deeply trouble John, and his half-sister, Gertie (Lauren German), suggests that it's time he gave up his life of crime, though it soon becomes clear she has motives of her own

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: Roman leader Tiberius (Adrien Brody) is intent on conquering the Silk Road region with his rogue army and it's up to an unlikely alliance between Roman general Lucius (John Cusack) and Chinese warrior Huo An (Jackie Chan) to gather the soldiers of 36 nations together to defeat him

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: Oscar winning drama with an uptight writer embarking on a life-changing adventure with Alexis Zorba, the gregarious musician he meets on a business trip to Greece

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: An underprivileged Cinderella chooses between two prom dates: a charming preppy and a disarming buddy

programme.title: Don't Say a Word
programme.desc: This psychological thriller from screenwriter Patrick Smith Kelly reunites him with his A Perfect Murder (1998) star Michael Douglas. Dr. Nathan Conrad (Douglas) is a respected adolescent therapist faced with a nightmarish scenario when his young daughter (Skye McCole Bartusiak) is snatched by Koster (Sean Bean), a criminal with a talent for high-tech surveillance. Conrad learns that the kidnapper is desperate for a critical piece of information known only to Elisabeth Burrows (Brittany Murphy), one of his catatonic pro bono patients. While his wife Aggie (Famke Janssen) remains at home, bedridden due to a broken leg, Conrad races to unlock the secret stored in Elisabeth's fractured mind, while a New York City detective (Jennifer Esposito) inches closer to discovering the Conrads' dilemma. Don't Say a Word co-stars Oliver Platt and Guy Torry and is directed by Gary Fleder, who follows up his suspense smash Kiss the Girls (1997)

programme.title: Paradise Road
programme.desc: Fact-based recounting of a group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II and used music as a relief to their misery

programme.title: 5 Flights Up
programme.desc: When an elderly couple discover that their Brooklyn apartment has increased in value, they decide to sell and move to Manhattan. However, they soon learn that relocating won't be easy

programme.title: My Blueberry Nights
programme.desc: Elizabeth has just been through a particularly nasty break-up, and now she's ready to leave her friends and memories behind as she chases her dreams across the U.S. In order to support herself on her journey, Elizabeth picks up a series of waitress jobs along the way. As Elizabeth crosses paths with a series of lost souls whose yearnings are even greater than her own -- including a troubled cop , his estranged wife, and an embittered gambler -- their emotional turmoil ultimately helps her gain a greater understanding of her own problems

programme.title: Unfinished Business
programme.desc: Ken Scott's comedy Unfinished Business stars Vince Vaughn as a struggling businessman trying to get his fledgling company off the ground. To do so he must travel with his partners (Dave Franco and Tom Wilkinson) on a foreign business trip in order to land a huge client. Unexpectedly, our hero discovers that he is competing against his former boss, and his attempts to show the prospective clients the best night of their lies leads to a number of unexpected complications

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Former covert operative Bryan Mills must race to protect his daughter while tracking down the criminals who framed him for killing his ex-wife. Meanwhile, the FBI, the CIA and the police are hot on his trail

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: A young suburban girl is abducted by spirits that have besieged her family's home in this terrifying remake of the horror classic. Desperate, her parents devise a plan to rescue her from the other side

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Naomi Watts and Tim Roth star in writer-director Michael Haneke's gripping remake of his acclaimed 1997 Austrian film about a family whose vacation home is invaded by two young men who subject them to a night of psychological and physical torture(n)

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organization. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions(n)

programme.title: House of 1000 Corpses
programme.desc: Heavy-metal rocker Rob Zombie made his directorial debut with this clever homage to horror films of the '70s. Shortly after two couples stop at a roadside museum, they're lured into the lair of a family of psychotics led by a demented matriarch (Karen Black). Sid Haig, Bill Moseley, Sheri Moon(n)

programme.title: The Hitcher
programme.desc: Remake of the 1986 chiller about a couple who pick up a psychopathic hitchhiker(n)

programme.title: Three O'Clock High
programme.desc: About a wimp (Casey Siemaszko) forced to fight the school bully (Richard Tyson). Brei: Stacey Glick. Franny: Anne Ryan. Phil Joanou directed(n)

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Director Brian Robbins' sci-fi comedy stars Eddie Murphy as both a man-sized humanoid spaceship and the diminutive captain of the same vessel. When a piece of extraterrestrial technology crash-lands in young Josh Morrison's bedroom, he initially thinks it's a meteorite. But it's actually an alien device designed to drain the Earth's oceans and save its home planet from salt-depleted doom. And when it fails its mission, a team of 100 tiny aliens are sent to complete the job, arriving amid a fireball on Liberty Island. Tenacious cop Officer Dooley is soon on their trail, while the alien crew start to mutiny over their plans to totally dehydrate Earth when they discover that the locals are much less primitive than they'd expected. Also starring Elizabeth Banks as Josh's mum Gina(n)

programme.title: Two Night Stand
programme.desc: Two Manhattan strangers get snowed in together following a one night stand that they both regret(n)

programme.title: Wild
programme.desc: A self-destructive divorcée hikes the Pacific Crest Trail in the US in a bid to conquer her demons. As she reflects on her failed marriage and her mother's death, the kindness of strangers helps her summon the courage she'll need to stay the course(n)

programme.title: December Boys
programme.desc: Harry Potter star Daniel Radcliffe stars in this coming of age drama as one of four young orphans who struggle to compete for the attentions of the same family(n)

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: The lives of four friends following their involvement in a holdup(n)

programme.title: Win Win
programme.desc: A cash-strapped lawyer (Paul Giamatti) thinks he's found a harmless way to save his business and the fortunes of a school wrestling team(n)

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: A group of friends try to start their own business, but things don't go to plan(n)

programme.title: Funny Games
programme.desc: Naomi Watts and Tim Roth star in writer-director Michael Haneke's gripping remake of his acclaimed 1997 Austrian film about a family whose vacation home is invaded by two young men who subject them to a night of psychological and physical torture

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: Thriller about a couple having marital problems and living in South America. When the husband is kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas, his company hires a professional negotiator, but bankruptcy causes them to wash their hands of the situation. Desperate to free her husband, the wife raises some money and persuades the negotiator to stay on the case, but the two find themselves becoming increasingly attracted to each other

programme.title: Swimfan
programme.desc: Ben Cronin has it all: the admiration of his many friends, a terrific girlfriend, and an appointment with swim scouts from Stanford. His wonderful life is disrupted by the arrival of Madison Bell. The new girl in town quickly sets her sights on the impressionable Ben. While their first few meetings are innocent enough, the seductive Madison wants more

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Two Chicago cops travel to Florida in an attempt to bring down a lethal drug-dealer trying to make himself into a major kingpin

programme.title: The Real McCoy
programme.desc: A flubbed bank heist lands Karen McCoy in jail for six long years. Once released, she tries to turn her life around, but her ex-husband has replaced her and told their young son she's dead. Karen's criminal record prevents her from securing employment and lodging. But after a meeting with her underhanded probation officer, she is forced into an involvement with Jack Schmidt, a criminal she is well acquainted with and who gets her caught up in one last $18 million bank heist

programme.title: The Drop
programme.desc: Lonely bartender Bob gets caught up in a robbery gone wrong thanks to his crooked cousin and boss Marv

programme.title: The Godfather Epic
programme.desc: A chronological version of Francis Ford Coppola's first two films, about the powerful Corleone crime family in America in the first half of the 20th century, contains scenes that were not included in the original theatrical releases

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: Legendary director Martin Scorsese takes the helm for this tale of questionable loyalties and blurring identities set in the South Boston organized crime scene and inspired by the wildly popular 2002 Hong Kong crime film Infernal Affairs. As the police force attempts to reign in the increasingly powerful Irish mafia, authorities are faced with the prospect of sending in an undercover agent or seeing their already frail grip on the criminal underworld slip even further. Billy Costigan (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a young cop looking to make a name for himself in the world of law enforcement. Collin Sullivan (Matt Damon) is a street-smart criminal who has successfully infiltrated the police department with the sole intention of reporting their every move to ruthless syndicate head Frank Costello (Jack Nicholson). When Costigan is assigned the task of working his way into Costello's tightly guarded inner circle, Sullivan is faced with the responsibility of rooting out the informer before things get out of hand. With the stakes constantly rising and time quickly running out for the undercover cop and his criminal counterpart, each man must work feverishly to reveal his counterpart before his identity is exposed by the other. Martin Sheen, Alec Baldwin, and Ray Winstone co-star, and writer William Monahan adapts a screenplay originally penned by Alan Mak and Felix Chong

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: A group of friends try to start their own business, but things don't go to plan

programme.title: Assassins
programme.desc: Robert Rath is a seasoned hitman who just wants out of the business with no back talk. But, as things go, it ain't easy. A younger preppier assassin named Bain is having a field day trying to kill him. Rath teams up with a computer hacker to defeat the obsessed Bain

programme.title: The Brink's Job
programme.desc: Peter Falk stars as loveable rogue who, after being released from a 1950s prison, plots the biggest heist of his life

programme.title: Out for Justice
programme.desc: An NYPD cop launches a manhunt when his former childhood buddy commits murder. Action

programme.title: Rogue
programme.desc: While travelling through the Outback, an American travel writer and a group of tourists are terrorised by an enormous killer crocodile

programme.title: One Missed Call
programme.desc: Shannyn Sossamon and Ed Burns star in director Eric Valette's remake of Takashi Miike's frightful tale about a cell-phone call from the future that foreshadows one's own death. Beth Raymond (Sossamon) is a college student whose friends have all been dying in droves, and the one connecting factor between all of the incidents is that just before their deaths, each of the victims received a message in which they heard themselves being murdered. Upon receiving her own frightening phone call, Beth has only three days to solve the mystery and cheat death. Burns co-stars as a detective who is deeply troubled by the recent spate of deaths

programme.title: Batman Forever
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader and his new partner Robin do battle with DA Harvey Dent and vengeful scientist The Riddler. Action adventure

programme.title: Demolition Man
programme.desc: Futuristic adventure about a cryogenically frozen cop who is thawed out when a psychopathic criminal escapes. Violence has been outlawed in the politically correct regime of 2032 and the only weapons in existence are consigned to a museum. When the escaped psychopath heads straight for the museum, the authorities decide that only the undesirable but effectively violent cop can stop him

programme.title: Dragon Blade
programme.desc: Roman leader Tiberius (Adrien Brody) is intent on conquering the Silk Road region with his rogue army and it's up to an unlikely alliance between Roman general Lucius (John Cusack) and Chinese warrior Huo An (Jackie Chan) to gather the soldiers of 36 nations together to defeat him

programme.title: Barb Wire
programme.desc: A bounty hunter's town and business are under siege by warring factions in this futuristic fantasy about comic-book babe Barb Wire

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: Ben Finn Finnegan is a treasure hunter who has made it his mission in life to track down the Queen's Dowry -- a legendary collection of 40 chests filled with priceless treasure, and lost at sea in 1715. But in his single-minded quest to track down this sizable booty, Finn has sadly neglected his marriage to his loving wife Tess. Tess has grown tired of the hunt, and now she's looking to start her life anew by going to work on the massive yacht of globetrotting billionaire Nigel Honeycutt

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A secret agent recruits a juvenile delinquent into a top-secret spy organization. Together, they battle a tech genius with diabolical ambitions

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: In this gruesome tribute to the Italian cannibal films of yesteryear, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a sadistic tribe of flesh-eating locals

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day

programme.title: Get On Up
programme.desc: A look at James Brown's rise from poverty to become one of the most influential entertainers in the world(n)

programme.title: Grand Canyon
programme.desc: The story of a series of awakenings, as the film's prosperous, complacent characters individually reach crisis point and resolve to live their lives differently. White accountant Mack and black trucker Simon begin a friendship across the class divide (the 'grand canyon' of the title), after Simon saves Mack from a gang of violent muggers. Meanwhile, Mack's wife Claire is dreading the 'empty nest' when their son leaves for college. But she comes across an abandoned baby while jogging in the park and wants to adopt. Even the unlikeable Steve Martin character, who's made his pile out of producing gory action films, resolves to eschew cinematic violence after he himself is injured in an assault(n)

programme.title: My Blue Heaven
programme.desc: A mob witness is relocated to a small town, and an FBI agent is supposed to help him to assimilate and keep a low profile(n)

programme.title: Lorenzo's Oil
programme.desc: The true-life drama of a father and mother who battled against the odds to save their son's life. Nick Nolte and Susan Sarandon star as Augusto and Michaela Odone, an Italian/Irish-American couple who are dealt a cruel blow by fate: in April 1984, five-year-old Lorenzo is diagnosed as having a rare and incurable disease. Doctors diagnose Lorenzo as suffering from Adrenoleukodystrophy (ALD), a degenerative disease which usually gives its sufferers around two years to live, but by this time the Odones are hot on the trail of what has come to be known as 'Lorenzo's Oil' - the cure which saves their son's life and re-writes medical history(n)

programme.title: Exodus: Gods and Kings
programme.desc: In this visually stunning Biblical epic based on the Book of Exodus, Moses clashes with Pharaoh Ramses over the fate of Egypt's slaves. When Ramses refuses to free them, a series of devastating plagues are unleashed upon the Egyptian people(n)

programme.title: The Accidental Tourist
programme.desc: William Hurt plays a writer who cannot get over after the death of his son. His wife leaves him and he eventually meets a new woman who helps him reconnect with life again. Soon his wife wants to reconcile and he now faces a tough decisions about his future(n)

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead
programme.desc: Frank Pierce has worked in one of the city's most brutal neighbourhoods for years, and the pressure of the job has taken its toll; plagued with self-doubt, he is haunted by the spirits of the people he was not able to save, and while he desperately wants to quit his job, outside forces won't let him walk away(n)

programme.title: Frequency
programme.desc: An atmospheric phenomenon enables a New York police officer to communicate with his beloved dead father, a firefighter and amateur radio enthusiast, across thirty years. He manages to warn his father of his own death, but by changing events in history the two unwittingly cause a tragedy and now need to try to alter history again(n)

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: Spike Lee's controversial biopic of the legendary American black leader Malcolm X, played by Oscar nominee Denzel Washington(n)

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: David Lynch wrote and directed this look at two women who find themselves walking a fine line between truth and deception in the beautiful but dangerous netherworld of Hollywood. A beautiful woman (Laura Elena Harring) riding in a limousine along Los Angeles' Mulholland Drive is targeted by a would-be shooter, but before he can pull the trigger, she is injured when her limo is hit by another car. The woman stumbles from the wreck with a head wound, and in time makes her way into an apartment with no idea of where or who she is. As it turns out, the apartment is home to an elderly woman who is out of town, and is allowing her niece Betty (Naomi Watts) to stay there; Betty is a small-town girl from Canada who wants to be an actress, and her aunt was able to arrange an audition with a film director for her. Betty befriends the injured woman, who begins calling herself "Rita" after seeing a poster of Rita Hayworth. While Betty's audition impresses a casting agent, and she catches the eye of hotshot director Adam Kesher (Justin Theroux), Kesher's producers and moneymen insist with no small vehemence that he instead cast a woman named Camilla Rhodes. As Rita attempts to put the pieces of her life back together, she pulls the name Diane Selwyn from her memory; Rita thinks it could be her real name, but when she and Betty find a listing for Diane Selwyn and visit her apartment, they discover the latest victim of a mysterious killer who is eluding police detective Harry McKnight (Robert Forster). Rita's emotional identity soon takes a left turn, and it turns out that neither woman is quite who she once appeared to be. David Lynch originally conceived Mulholland Drive as the pilot film for a television series; after the ABC television network rejected the pilot and declined to air it, the French production film StudioCanal took over the project, and Lynch reshot and re-edited the material into a theatrical feature. The resulting version of Mulholland Drive premiered at the 2001 Cannes Film Festival, where David Lynch shared Best Director honors with Joel Coen(n)

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Biopic of Chris Kyle, a celebrated sniper in the American military. In the aftermath of 9/11, Kyle decides to serve his country by becoming a Navy SEAL. But with each tour of duty, he grows more detached from his wife and children(n)

programme.title: Bad Lieutenant
programme.desc: A corrupt New York City cop with drug and gambling addictions investigates the rape of a nun(n)

programme.title: The Bachelor
programme.desc: When Jimmie Shannon (Chris O'Donnell) clumsily proposes to long-term girlfriend Anne Arden (Renée Zellweger), she turns him down flat but three days later, he needs a bride - any bride. His grandfather (Peter Ustinov) has died, leaving him $100m on condition he marries before he's 30. With his birthday just 30 hours away, he must either woo Arden all over again or marry one of the thousands of would-be wives who, hearing of his plight, have set off in hot pursuit. Gary (Leon the Pig Farmer) Sinyor's charming romantic comedy holds few surprises but along the way, the performances of the two leads is genuinely engaging and the comedy nicely understated(n)

programme.title: Heartbreakers
programme.desc: In this delightful comedy, Sigourney Weaver and Jennifer Love Hewitt play mother-daughter con artists who have made a career out of swindling men out of their fortunes. All goes well until one of them falls for her mark. Gene Hackman, Ray Liotta, Anne Bancroft, Jason Lee, Jeffrey Jones, Nora Dunn(n)

Drama set in a Los Angeles school. Trevor is a teacher from New York. Having survived a near-fatal stabbing by a student, he transfers to LA. But the school he moves to is worse than anything he encountered in New York. However, he is determined to both teach and guide his pupils but when playing by the rules doesn't work, Trevor adopts more extreme measures..(n)

programme.title: Mimic
programme.desc: This tense thriller, mostly set in a creepy and atmospheric underground, stars Mira Sorvino as a scientist who develops a breed of bug designed to kill all the plague-carrying cockroaches in New York before self-destructing. Years later, when a couple of kids bring her a strange insect they found in the New York subway system, she realises the insects did not die; they evolved(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: The Sixth Sense is an eerie, captivating and highly original chiller with a tantalising twist in its tail. The movie stars Bruce Willis as Malcolm Crowe, a brilliant paediatric psychologist who takes on the task of curing a young boy named Cole Sear who claims he can see dead people(n)

programme.title: Pollock
programme.desc: Biopic of American abstract expressionist painter Jackson Pollock(n)

programme.title: K-19: The Widowmaker
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, the film follows the heroism of Captain Alexei Vostrikov who, at the height of the Cold War, is ordered to take command of the nuclear missile submarine K-19 away from its original commander Captain Mikhail Polenin. Vostrikov's mission is to quickly ready the ill-prepared sub for her maiden voyage - no matter what the cost. But Vostrikov, Polenin and K-19's loyal crew can never imagine all that is expected of them. Neither can they fathom what the price of failure might be for them and for the world when a nuclear reactor malfunctions, threatening a core meltdown and an explosion that will certainly kill all aboard. As they glide beneath the Arctic seas, it is the crew's collective bravery and Vostrikov's daring embrace of his duty toward his country and his men which will ultimately save K-19... and stave off what surely would have been a nuclear disaster(n)

programme.title: Taken 3
programme.desc: Former covert operative Bryan Mills must race to protect his daughter while tracking down the criminals who framed him for killing his ex-wife. Meanwhile, the FBI, the CIA and the police are hot on his trail(n)

programme.title: Proof of Life
programme.desc: Thriller about a couple having marital problems and living in South America. When the husband is kidnapped by anti-government guerrillas, his company hires a professional negotiator, but bankruptcy causes them to wash their hands of the situation. Desperate to free her husband, the wife raises some money and persuades the negotiator to stay on the case, but the two find themselves becoming increasingly attracted to each other(n)

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller, four friends get in over their heads when they become indebted to a dangerous crime boss. Now, they must kidnap a beloved member of a rival kingpin's family in order to erase their debt, and do so without getting caught or killed in the process(n)

programme.title: Wild Rovers
programme.desc: William Holden and Ryan O'Neal team in Blake Edwards' tale of two bored cowboys who become bank robbers. Walter: Karl Malden. Sada: Lynn Carlin. John: Tom Skerritt. Paul: Joe Don Baker. Joe: James Olson. Nell: Leora Dana. Maybell: Rachel Roberts. Ben: Moses Gunn. Filmed in Arizona and Utah(n)

programme.title: The Hanging Tree
programme.desc: Delmer Davis's (3:10 to Yuma) romantic western set during the gold rush of the 1860s. With Gary Cooper, George C. Scott and Karl Malden (who helped direct some scenes). (1959)(n)

programme.title: Quantrill's Raiders
programme.desc: The oft-told tale of controversial Southern-sympathizing outlaw Quantrill is recounted again in this low-budget western. Leo Gordon, possessor of one of the meanest faces in the movies, plays Quantrill, but top billing is bestowed upon Steve Cochran as Westcott, a Confederate officer assigned to collaborate with the vigilante leader in a raid on an ammunition depot in Lawrence, Kansas. Westcott is forced to move on when the ammo supply is moved, but the vengeance-driven Quantrill insists upon remaining in Lawrence, there to indulge in one of the bloodiest and most sadistic raids in Kansas history. Quantrill's Raiders was directed by Edward Bernds, who'd come a long way since his Three Stooges shorts of the early 1950s(n)

programme.title: Billy the Kid
programme.desc: Robert Taylor takes the title role in this biopic of the notorious outlaw who turned killer after the death of a friend(n)

programme.title: Annie Get Your Gun
programme.desc: George Sidney directed this adaptation of the Irving Berlin stage hit, with Betty Hutton as Annie(n)

programme.title: The Iron Mistress
programme.desc: American adventurer Jim Bowie attempts to make his way into the lumber business. Travelling to New Orleans he falls in love with a manipulative woman who he must fight all other rivals for(n)

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: The story of Jeb Stewart, his romance with Kit Carson Holiday, friendship with George Custer and battles against John Brown in the days leading up to the outbreak of the American Civil War(n)

programme.title: They Died With Their Boots On
programme.desc: Flynn cuts a dash in Raoul Walsh's stirring biopic of General Custer, revealing the ambition and courage that inspired the famous Last Stand. Quinn stars as the Sioux leader Crazy Horse, and de Havilland as Custer's wife(n)

programme.title: The Left Handed Gun
programme.desc: Classic gun-slinging Western starring as the young tough juvenile wanted dead or alive across the Wild West... Billy the Kid(n)

programme.title: The Shooting
programme.desc: A mysterious woman hires three bounty hunters (Jack Nicholson, Warren Oates, Will Hutchins) as part of an elaborate revenge plan in this existential cult film, written by Adrien Joyce ("Five Easy Pieces"). Leland: B.J. Merholz. Indian: Guy El Tsosie. Bearded Man: Charles Eastman(n)

programme.title: Little Big Man
programme.desc: How the West was won is recalled by a 121-year-old eyewitness who recounts tales of being raised by the Cheyenne and his days as a con man, pioneer, hermit and gunfighter, before becoming an Indian scout to General Custer and being the only survivor of the battle of Little Big Horn(n)

programme.title: McCabe and Mrs. Miller
programme.desc: Gambler John McCabe sets up a whorehouse in a rough mining town. Two wealthy businessmen offer to buy him out, but by the time he's agreed to sell, they've brought in gunmen to conclude the deal with bullets. An unusual, downbeat western(n)

programme.title: Heaven's Gate
programme.desc: Michael Cimino's Oscar nominated western stars Kris Kristofferson as a Sheriff who clashes with a new gunslinger in town over the love of a woman(n)

programme.title: Elvis Mitchell: Under the Influence
programme.desc: Bill Murray. Bill Murray talks about his affinity for actors Cary Grant and William Holden, and his appreciation of funny women such as Margaret Sullavan, Gilda Radner and Elaine May. He also sings the praises of "comedy assassins" the Marx Brothers and discusses favorite films, including "Stalag 17," "Hoosiers" and a 1918 D.W. Griffith silent "A Romance of Happy Valley."(n)

programme.title: Eleven Men and a Girl
programme.desc: Frolic on the campus, with the president's job staked on winning the football trophy. Joe E. Brown, Joan Bennett, George Irving, James Hall(n)

programme.title: Sally
programme.desc: Adaptation of the 1920 Broadway show about a waitress who wants to be a dancer. Originally released in Technicolor(n)

programme.title: Top Speed
programme.desc: Two stockbrokerage clerks pose as millionaires at an exclusive resort. Joe E. Brown, Jack Watling, Bernice Claire, Frank McHugh. Mervyn LeRoy directed(n)

programme.title: Broad-Minded
programme.desc: Romp about a confirmed bachelor (Joe E. Brown) protecting his cousin (William Collier Jr.) from designing women. Ona Munson, Thelma Todd, Holmes Herbert, Marjorie White, Bela Lugosi. Polly: Grayce Hampton. Directed by Mervyn LeRoy(n)

programme.title: Going Wild
programme.desc: Joe E. Brown is up to his usual antics in this yarn about a man who poses as an aviator to impress a woman (Laura Lee) and get a room in a hotel. Lawrence Gray, Ona Munson, Walter Pidgeon, Frank McHugh, May Boley, Anders Randolf, Johnny Arthur(n)

programme.title: Local Boy Makes Good
programme.desc: Joe E. Brown vehicle about a botany student and the girl he worships from afar. Julia: Dorothy Lee. Marjorie: Ruth Hall. Doc: Wade Boteler. Spike: Edward Woods. Colonel Small: William Burress. Directed by Mervyn LeRoy(n)

programme.title: Sit Tight
programme.desc: In this comedy, the owners of a health clinic get in over their heads when they endeavor to train a wrestler to win the upcoming championship(n)

programme.title: The Tenderfoot
programme.desc: George S. Kaufman's sturdy stage comedy The Butter and Egg Man was the inspiration for no fewer than four Warner Bros. talkie versions. The first of these was The Tenderfoot, starring Joe E. Brown as a wealthy but naive cowboy alone in the Big Apple. The producers of a down-and-out musical revue hope to convince Brown to put his money in their show, sending out cute chorine Ginger Rogers as the "convincer." After having his heart broken a few times and tangling with gangsters, Joe comes through and the show goes on. Warners followed The Tenderfoot with a 1937 musicalization of Butter and Egg Man, Dance Charlie Dance; this in turn was remade as An Angel From Texas in 1942. The final variation on this theme (so far!) was Three Sailors and a Girl (53)(n)

programme.title: You Said a Mouthful
programme.desc: In this slapstick comedy, a chronically-downtrodden worker at a business office devises an unsinkable swim suit. Though he is so terrified of water that he doesn't even drink it, he tests his invention. While there, he meets a beautiful heiress who mistakes him for a championship swimmer(n)

programme.title: Six-Day Bike Rider
programme.desc: A popular fad of the early 1930s provided the framework for this Joe E. Brown romp. Hoping to impress his girlfriend Phyllis (Maxine Doyle), champion bicyclist Wilfred Simpson (Brown) enters a bike-racing marathon at Madison Square Garden. Newsreel shots of genuine six-day races are incorporated into the footage, but the film loses all touch with reality at the climax, as Wilfred leapfrogs over the heads of the other riders and accidentally disposes of his rivals with chloroformed cotton wads. And, of course, he lets loose with the famous Joe E. Brown howwwwwl whenever the pace slows down. Even though the fad which inspired it has passed into history, Six-Day Bike Rider remains fresh and funny today(n)

programme.title: Screen Directors Playhouse
programme.desc: The Silent Partner. "The Silent Partner" stars Buster Keaton as a forgotten silent-screen comedian who sits drinking at a greasy-spoon diner in Hollywood while the Oscar telecast plays on the bar TV. The regulars slowly begin to identify the old star as he's featured in a lifetime-achievement tribute clip to a famous filmmaker (Joe E. Brown). Bob Hope has a cameo as himself(n)

programme.title: Scarecrow
programme.desc: Award winning drama starring Gene Hackman and Al Pacino as an ex-con and a sailor who form a unlikely friendship as they learn to see the world through one another's eyes(n)

programme.title: The Last Detail
programme.desc: Hal Ashby's film stars Jack Nicholson and Otis Young as two hardened sailors escorting the young recruit Randy Quaid to eight years in prison for petty crimes who discover he has no experience of the world and decide to introduce him to women, booze and brawling in just one night(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Night of the Crash. In the Season 3 premiere, the clan deals with the loss of a family member

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: One of the CIA's finest agents is killed in Prague in the middle of an operation to stop East European terrorists. His identical twin brother, New York ticket scalper Jake Hayes, is recruited to complete the mission. But Jake isn't convinced that suits and guns are his thing. Espionage thriller with a comic edge

programme.desc: In this relentless thriller, a man terrorizes a mother and her children after claiming car trouble to gain entry to their home

programme.desc: When Cameron Diaz and Jason Segel's naughty video leaks, they face a race against time to stop their nearest and dearest seeing it. Raunchy comedy. (2014)(92 mins)

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter helps an FBI agent track down a serial killer. Violent remake of "Manhunter."

programme.title: Mad Money
programme.desc: A charming-as-ever Diane Keaton stars as a desperate housewife who gets a job as a janitor at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank, where she and two other low-level employees (Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) devise a plan to steal a fortune in old bills already marked for shredding. Oscar-winning screenwriter Callie Khouri ("Thelma & Louise") directed. Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes
