programme.title: Freaks of Nature
programme.desc: A town full of humans, zombies, and vampires living in coexistence are thrust into an all-out war when aliens invade. Now, three teens must defeat the newest visitors to restore the peace

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Boyz N the Hood
programme.desc: As a child, Tre Styles is sent by his mother to live with his father. Tre is forced to grow up in a neighbourhood crippled by gang violence and drugs. With his father's guidance Tre stays out of trouble, but friend Doughboy continually gets arrested. While running an errand, Tre and Ricky are stalked by a gang member, as they try to escape Ricky is shot and killed. Blamed by his mother for his brother's death, Doughboy sets out to avenge Ricky's murder(n)

programme.title: Moonraker
programme.desc: This romantic thriller is essentially the Scarlet Pimpernel relocated in place and time across the Channel to the English Civil War. George Baker plays the eponymous Cavalier hero, fighting off the Roundhead foe as he single-handedly saves the country's aristocracy, smuggling them to safety in France. But when Charles II decides to take the trip, Cromwell's cronies are waiting in the wings. Marius Goring and John Le Mesurier (as Cromwell) beef up the supporting cast, while Sylvia Syms provides the romantic interest in a dashing yarn of love, courage and betrayal. Directed by David MacDonald(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this moving drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: STARZ Insider: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: A preview of the 2016 remake of "Ghostbusters," starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Kate McKinnon and Leslie Jones as the paranormal investigators(n)

programme.title: Never Been Kissed
programme.desc: In Raja Gosnell's bubbling romantic comedy, Drew Barrymore plays Josie Geller, a mousy sub-editor at the Chicago Sun-Times who's offered a chance at reporting by going back to high school undercover to find out what the kids are really up to. Unfortunately, she dresses like a geek and is ostracised by everyone, apart from Aldys. Finding her feet, she excels at English under teacher Sam Coulson, who she fancies, despite the slight problem posed by teacher/ student relationships. But things start to look up when her brother Rob shows her how to be cool. But will she get her story and her man? Edited for edited for language(n)

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Schmidt and Jenko go undercover on a college campus, posing as students to bust criminal activity amid the undergrads in this hilarious sequel to the hit comedy "21 Jump Street."(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: In the fifth James Bond thriller starring Sean Connery, Bond has to battle Ernst Stavro Blofeld and SPECTRE, who have been gathering Russian and American spacecrafts in a diabolical plan to begin WWIII. Though Roald Dahl's script contains some serious lapses of logic, the film is entertaining(n)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: Medieval fantasy meets futuristic science fiction in this effects-heavy action epic from former X-Files director Rob Bowman. In present-day London, 12-year-old Quinn Abercromby witnesses the awakening of a hibernating dragon from a centuries-long slumber, the result of a construction dig supervised by his mother and an incident for which Quinn feels partially responsible. Twenty years later, the adult Quinn is the fire chief of a refortified castle community, responsible for dousing the blazes lit by the dragon's prodigious number of flame-spewing offspring, airborne juggernauts that have wreaked havoc across the globe, torching civilization and turning humans into an endangered species. Hope arrives in the form of Denton "Dragon Slayer" Van Zan, an American known to be the only man to ever kill one of the dragons, and Alex Jenson, a scientist/pilot who's a member of Van Zan's army, a zealous fighting force that includes a secret weapon: the Archangels, paratroopers using themselves as bait to attract and then dispatch the deadly beasts(n)

programme.title: A View to a Kill
programme.desc: A silicon chip is captured from the Soviets and found to be identical to a prototype British design capable of withstanding the intense electromagnetic radiation of a nuclear blast. The British suspect industrialist Max Zorin of leaking details of the design to the Russians. When James Bond is sent to investigate he finds that Zorin is stockpiling silicon chips and, mysteriously, drilling near the San Andreas fault

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: Mexican filmmaker Alejandro González Iñárritu makes his first English-language feature with the downbeat drama 21 Grams. Set in an unnamed U.S. urban center, the film uses a nonlinear structure to piece together the intertwined lives of three very different people. Paul (Sean Penn) is a math teacher with a heart problem and a troubled marriage to British wife Mary (Charlotte Gainsbourg). Christine (Naomi Watts) is a former drug addict who lives with her husband, Michael (Danny Huston), and her daughters. Jack (Benicio del Toro) is a born-again Christian with a wife (Melissa Leo) who has stood by him since his days as a criminal. Following a tragic accident, the three main characters are thrown into each other's lives. 21 Grams was shown in competition at the 2003 Venice International Film Festival

programme.title: Schindler's List
programme.desc: Multi-Oscar-winning true story of an Austrian entrepreneur who sets out to profit from World War II by using cheap Jewish labour in his factory but finally risks everything to save his workers after seeing the scale of Nazi barbarity firsthand. An overwhelmingly powerful realisation of Thomas Keneally's bestseller 'Schindler's Ark', with vivid reconstructions of the Cracow ghetto and the death camps

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: The legacy of a populist Southern politician whose lofty ambitions for the future leave him open to corruption and scandal

programme.title: Live and Let Die
programme.desc: Investigating the deaths of three British agents, 007 encounters Mr. Big and Dr. Kananga, leaders of a vast crime network

programme.title: The World Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Suave British secret agent James Bond is embroiled in an all-action race to defuse an international power struggle as the world's oil supply hangs in the balance. Following the murder of a tycoon, 007 becomes bodyguard to his daughter, who has been targeted by a psychotic terrorist. Pierce Brosnan's third outing as Bond

programme.title: Déjà vu
programme.desc: Port Authority cop Doug Carlin travels back in time to save the key witness in the investigation into a ferry bombing. Thriller

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: When crop circles herald the arrival of alien invaders, ex-preacher Mel Gibson must fight to save his family

programme.title: No Way Out
programme.desc: A taut thriller with a twist in the tail. Clean-cut US naval officer Tom Farrell gets out of his depth when he becomes involved with a politician's mistress during a posting to the Pentagon. But when the woman is murdered, Farrell suspects a cover-up within the inner circles of the government as a scapegoat is sought. Ordered to head the investigation, Farrell finds the trail of clues starting to point to his own involvement

programme.title: From Russia with Love
programme.desc: Super-spy James Bond finds his life under threat when he aids a beautiful Russian girl who wants to defect to the West with a politically invaluable cipher machine. It soon becomes apparent that the girl is merely being used as a pawn by Spectre, a group of international criminals intent on finishing off 007 once and for all - wherever in the world he may flee

programme.desc: Environmental activist Albert hires two 'existential detectives' to find out what's keeping him awake at night. They discover that Albert's mind is haunted by handsome rival, corporate PR exec Brad. But does Brad need more help than Albert?

programme.title: Love Is Strange
programme.desc: A committed gay couple's fledgling marriage is challenged by a series of unexpected setbacks in this powerful drama. When George is fired from his teaching position at a Catholic school, he and Ben lose the NYC apartment they have shared for 20 years. Now in order to get back on their feet, they are both forced into uncomfortable living arrangements that put their union to the ultimate test

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the U.S. president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders

programme.title: On Her Majesty's Secret Service
programme.desc: Secret agent James Bond travels around the world searching for criminal mastermind Ernst Blofeld, and finds an unexpected ally in a troubled young Contessa whom 007 considers marrying

programme.title: Playing It Cool
programme.desc: A writer who doesn't believe in love is tasked to write a romantic comedy. But when he meets a beautiful woman at a wedding, he is forced to rethink his beliefs. The only problem: She's already engaged

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Night of the Crash. In the Season 3 premiere, the clan deals with the loss of a family member

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: This inspiring true-life football saga centers on Vince Papale, a 30-year-old sandlot player who earned a spot on the 1976 Philadelphia Eagles. In time, Papale becomes a special-teams star and fan favorite

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An New York tycoon adopts a vivacious orphan as a PR stunt in his bid to become mayor, but the little girl becomes his saving grace by teaching him what's truly important in life

programme.title: The Man with the Golden Gun
programme.desc: James Bond tries to locate a powerful weapon while outwitting a criminal mastermind with a small but ruthless henchman who means to end 007's life

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover

programme.title: The Cat's Meow
programme.desc: (2001) Peter Bogdanovich's fact-based film is set on William Randolph Hearst's yacht in 1924, when film producer Thomas Ince was shot dead. No one was ever convicted of the crime but many believe that Hearst was the killer, mistaking Ince for Charlie Chaplin, who may (or may not) have been having an affair with Hearst's mistress, Marion Davies. With Edward Herrmann as Hearst, Eddie Izzard as Chaplin and Kirsten Dunst as Davies

programme.title: Kinsey
programme.desc: Bill Condon ("Gods and Monsters") wrote and directed this provocative and intelligent biopic of Alfred Kinsey (Liam Neeson), the pioneering sex researcher of the 1940s and '50s. Laura Linney received an Oscar nomination as Kinsey's freethinking wife. Chris O'Donnell, Peter Sarsgaard, Timothy Hutton, John Lithgow

programme.title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
programme.desc: John Kelso is a writer sent from New York to the small southern town of Savannah, Georgia to cover a wealthy antique dealer's Christmas party. Kelso is strangely attracted to this small town and its eccentric and colourful population and, when the antique dealer, Jim Williams, murders his gay lover, Kelso feels compelled to help out in the case and immerse himself in the strange world of Savannah society

programme.title: Diamonds Are Forever
programme.desc: A diamond smuggling investigation leads James Bond to Las Vegas, where he uncovers an extortion plot headed by his nemesis, Ernst Stavro Blofeld

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: During the Allies' final push into Europe in April 1945, a battle-weary Army sergeant leads a Sherman tank and its crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: This biopic of visionary French clothing designer Yves Saint Laurent focuses on his cutting-edge work during the 1960s and '70s

programme.title: Infamous
programme.desc: Toby Jones gives a superb performance as author Truman Capote in this incisive biographical drama exploring Capote's close relationship with a doomed killer (Daniel Craig) while researching a murder case. Sandra Bullock, Peter Bogdanovich, Jeff Daniels, Hope Davis. Directed by Douglas McGrath

programme.title: The Grey Zone
programme.desc: Screenwriter-director Tim Blake Nelson adapted his play for this graphic and disturbing drama about a group of prisoners in a Nazi death camp near the end of WWII who were coerced into exterminating their Jewish brethren. David Arquette, Steve Buscemi, Harvey Keitel, Allan Corduner, Mira Sorvino, Natasha Lyonne, Daniel Benzali, David Chandler

programme.title: Fury
programme.desc: During the Allies' final push into Europe in April 1945, a battle-weary Army sergeant leads a Sherman tank and its crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: A life-changing journey to East Africa causes a former gang member (Gerard Butler) to dedicate his life to rescuing children who were captured and trained as soldiers by the Lord's Resistance Army in this inspirational drama based on actual events

programme.title: For Your Eyes Only
programme.desc: Spy thriller in which British agent James Bond is dispatched to recover a strategic communications device before it finds its way into the hands of the Russians. When the secret device that controls Britain's Polaris submarines goes missing after the spy ship carrying it sinks, 007 joins forces with a vengeful woman and a wealthy hero of the Greek resistance movement to find the equipment(n)

programme.title: Octopussy
programme.desc: A fake Faberge egg holds the key to an international criminal operation and a Russian plot to wage nuclear war, and it falls to ace MI6 spy James Bond to attempt to foil it. Adventure(n)

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Riveting docudrama about millionaire John du Pont and his relationship with brothers Dave and Mark Schultz, Olympic wrestlers who train at his estate. Mark initially idolizes du Pont, but slowly realizes the depths of his benefactor's madness(n)

programme.title: Get on the Bus
programme.desc: A group of African-American men head from Los Angeles to Washington, D.C., for the Million Man March(n)

programme.title: Still Alice
programme.desc: Renowned linguistics professor Alice Howland (Julianne Moore) fights to stay connected to her family, friends, and herself after being diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease. Moore won an Oscar for Best Actress for her work in this movie. Kristen Stewart, Kate Bosworth, Alec Baldwin, and Hunter Parrish co-star(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Chiwetel Ejiofor faces the destructive power of LA's corrupt underbelly in David Mamet's twisting drama(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: Foxcatcher
programme.desc: Riveting docudrama about millionaire John du Pont and his relationship with brothers Dave and Mark Schultz, Olympic wrestlers who train at his estate. Mark initially idolizes du Pont, but slowly realizes the depths of his benefactor's madness(n)

programme.title: Dad
programme.desc: Funny and moving tale of an elderly father and his adult son who rediscover each other - and themselves - when brought together by a family crisis. When Bettie (Olympia Dukakis), the wife of 75-year-old Jake Tremont (Jack Lemmon), is hospitalized, his long-absent son John (Ted Danson) moves in and looks after him. Gradually, his son's presence revitalises Jake and turns him into a new man, complete with a new lust for life(n)

programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: Drama starring Anthony Hopkins and Emma Thompson in which an English butler's professional and emotional life is examined retrospectively during a journey towards a reunion with the housekeeper he loved years before. He recalls his lengthy unquestioned service with a reactionary, pro-Nazi aristocrat, and his painfully unfulfilled relationship with the woman he is going to meet(n)

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: Man is out to expose fraudulent mediums, but finds his views tested when he meets seemingly genuine spiritualist

programme.title: Very Bad Things
programme.desc: A group of friends decide to give Kyle one last night of freedom before his wedding day. A bachelor party in Las Vegas sounds just the ticket. Drugs, booze and a stripper turn the party into murder and a test of friendship

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II
programme.desc: Paul Hogan stars as Mick Crocodile Dundee. After falling in love with Sue in New York, Mick takes her back to the outback

programme.title: Only the Lonely
programme.desc: A bittersweet tale of a single, 38-year-old Chicago cop who has lived with his mother all his life. When he falls in love with the shy daughter of a local mortician, he finds his resolve challenged by the guilt he feels at the prospect of leaving his strong-willed mother - guilt that she is only too happy to reinforce with her tart objections. Well-defined characterisations bring the working-class environment vividly to life

programme.title: We'll Never Have Paris
programme.desc: In this charming romantic comedy, a man second-guesses his plans to propose to his girlfriend after a pretty coworker hits on him. When his girlfriend flees to Paris, he follows her in a last-ditch effort to salvage their relationship

programme.title: Bull Durham
programme.desc: Charming romantic comedy about life and love at a minor-league baseball team

programme.title: The Last Supper
programme.desc: Stacy Title's witty black comedy sees a group of liberal students accidentally kill a rabidly right wing dinner guest. Hiding his body, they realise they can get away with murder as well as ridding the world of a few fascists by inviting them to dinner... With Cameron Diaz, Annabeth Gish and Ron Eldard

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: More than a decade since a painful Prom Night accident scuppered his chances with the hottest girl in school, a perennial loser decides to track her down and win her over. Comedy

programme.title: Bottle Rocket
programme.desc: Talented brothers Owen and Luke Wilson star in this quirky, offbeat comedy. The farcical film follows three friends who, despite their ambitions to become distinguished thieves, manage to bungle every attempt at pulling off a heist. Robert Musgrave, James Caan, Lumi Cavazos. Directed by Wes Anderson

programme.desc: After unexpectedly finding a treasure map, three friends head in search of hidden gold. Along the way, they hitch up with the twin brother of an old companion

programme.title: In Good Company
programme.desc: Paul Weitz ("About a Boy") directed this appealing and perceptive dramedy starring Dennis Quaid as a middle-aged ad exec who is demoted. Enter Topher Grace as his new boss, a 26-year-old hotshot who falls for Quaid's young daughter

programme.title: A Rage in Harlem
programme.desc: Stylish comedy-thriller, based on one of Chester Himes' great Harlem-set novels. Robin Givens stars as Imabelle, the mistress of vicious Harlem hood Slim, who takes off back to Harlem with a trunkful of gold stolen by Slim from the Deep South. Once there, she seduces naïve undertaker's assistant Jackson, with the young man immediately assuming a role as her protector. However, little does the young man realise the depth of trouble he's getting himself and his hustler brother Goldie into, for with Slim on his way to collect his money and a big-shot underworld figure moving in for a piece of the action, all hell is about to be unleashed in Harlem

His final consignment stretches his mental capacity to its limit as, pursued by an evil conglomerate, he takes information from Beijing to America. Adapted by William Gibson from his own short story Director: Robert Longo(n)

programme.desc: A man who is bipolar attempts to win back his estranged wife by taking care of their two young, spirited daughters(n)

programme.desc: In 1917, a wealthy rancher hires four mercenaries to retrieve his wife from the clutches of a desperado who is holding her hostage in a desert fortress in Mexico. Richard Brooks was nominated for Best Director and Best Adapted Screenplay(n)

programme.title: Lightning in a Bottle
programme.desc: The United States Congress named 2003 the "Year of the Blues" as part of an initiative by several musical education groups to make more Americans aware of the history and heritage of blues music, one of America's most important homegrown art forms. To kick off this celebration of the blues, a special concert was held at New York City's historic Radio City Music Hall, and Lightning in a Bottle documents a memorable evening of music from a star-studded roster of artists. Offering a glimpse at the rehearsals and preparations that went into putting the show together as well as the evening's best performances, Lightning in a Bottle includes appearances by B.B. King, Bonnie Raitt, Steven Tyler and Joe Perry of Aerosmith, Macy Gray, Buddy Guy, Chuck D., Solomon Burke, David Johansen, Jimmie Vaughan and Kim Wilson of the Fabulous Thunderbirds, Alison Krauss, and many more(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: This sequel finds Deuce coming out of retirement when his old pimp is accused of killing male prostitutes in Amsterdam(n)

programme.title: Posse
programme.desc: This fast-paced, stylized western views the traditional genre from an unusual African-American perspective, presenting the adventures of a group of escaped black soldiers as they attempt to protect a small, African-American community from the evil acts of a corrupt white sheriff(n)

programme.title: The Magic of Belle Isle
programme.desc: A widowed author heads to a lakeside town to drown his sorrows for the summer, but his lively neighbours have other ideas. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Power

programme.title: In My Country
programme.desc: The many emotional scars left by South Africa's history of institutionalized racism come under the microscope in this drama. As South Africa comes to terms with the legacy of apartheid, their government has created the Truth and Reconciliation Commission, in which the perpetrators of racial violence and injustice must come face to face with their victims if they are to be forgiven for their crimes. Langston Whitfield (Samuel L. Jackson) is an African-American journalist who is assigned to cover these hearings by The Washington Post; Whitfield doubts the efficacy of this process, and sets out to interview Col. De Jager (Brendan Gleeson), a notorious former officer of the South African police who was famous for his violence against blacks in order to put this method to the test. While in South Africa, Whitfield meets Anna Malan (Juliette Binoche), an Afrikaner poet who is covering the hearing for a radio station and is both appalled and disturbed by the details of the violence inflicted against her countrymen. After striking up a friendship, Whitfield and Malan become romantically involved as they try to come to terms with their feelings about what they've learned. Also screened under the title Country of My Skull, In My Country was adapted from a book by South African author Antjie Krog(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: It's Never Over. Ghost deals with loose ends before tangling with some new nightlife competition; Tommy confronts Tasha, who must learn to coexist with Angela. Later, Tommy finds an advisor in a former lover(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Guy
programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.title: Posse
programme.desc: This fast-paced, stylized western views the traditional genre from an unusual African-American perspective, presenting the adventures of a group of escaped black soldiers as they attempt to protect a small, African-American community from the evil acts of a corrupt white sheriff(n)

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: A solemn look at South African apartheid, Arthur Penn's claustrophobic drama centers on a pair of political interrogations, separated by a decade. The film's first part, set in 1988, centers on the imprisonment of Marty Strydom (Eric Stoltz), an Afrikaaner university professor held as a political prisoner under suspicion of conspiring with anti-government forces. His case falls into the hands of the villainous Colonel Kruger (Nigel Hawthorne), a brilliant and evil torturer determined to break the idealistic Strydom's spirit. The conclusion takes place nearly a decade later, after apartheid's fall. Now it is Krueger who is under confinement, and subjected to unrelenting questioning from a black South African (Louis Gossett Jr.) looking to beat Kruger at his own manipulative game. While offering numerous powerful confrontations between its characters, Bima Stagg's screenplay provides few narrative surprises, and some may find the film's limited setting and bare-bones treatments monotonous. However, Penn's stark style suits the harsh subject matter and keeps the focus strongly upon the cast, who provide appropriately intense performances(n)

programme.title: Entrapment
programme.desc: When a priceless Rembrandt painting is stolen from a New York skyscraper in a daring and technically sophisticated robbery, ace insurance investigator Virginia Gin Baker begins looking into the matter and is soon convinced it's the work of master art thief Robert Mac MacDougal(n)

programme.title: The Color of Freedom
programme.desc: Racist prison guard James Gregory rethinks his bigoted beliefs when inmate Nelson Mandela shows him another way. Inspiring biopic based on Gregory's memoirs(n)

programme.title: To Sir, With Love
programme.desc: Engineer Mark Thackeray arrives to teach a totally undisciplined class at an East End school. Still hoping for a good engineering job, he's hopeful that he won't be there long. He starts implementing his own brand of classroom discipline: forcing the pupils to treat each other with respect. Inevitably he begins getting involved in the students' personal lives, and must avoid the advances of an amorous student while winning over the class tough. What will he decide when the engineering job comes through?(n)

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: A man suffering from mental illness turns to crime to support himself after leaving a group home. As he struggles to prove that he is capable of living on his own, a benevolent nurse does her best to provide support(n)

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: The only colour that basketball hustlers Sidney and Billy are worried about is green, as they use their different backgrounds to their full advantage(n)

programme.title: Ali: An American Hero
programme.desc: Stars David Ramsey as legendary boxer Muhammad Ali, whose story is told largely in flashbacks. Beginning with Ali's childhood, when he was known as Cassius Clay, Ali: An American Hero traces the boxer's career, love life, and eventual devotion to Islam(n)

programme.title: Entrapment
programme.desc: When a priceless Rembrandt painting is stolen from a New York skyscraper in a daring and technically sophisticated robbery, ace insurance investigator Virginia Gin Baker begins looking into the matter and is soon convinced it's the work of master art thief Robert Mac MacDougal(n)

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Miami dentist Ted Brooks is delighted to hear that he has been named his mother's will, and travels to Alaska to claim his inheritance. But he discovers his new property is slightly unusual: he now owns a team of sled dogs. It turns out his mother was an Alaskan sled-racing champion! Another shock awaits Ted in the frozen wastes: his real dad is a grumpy old white man who's only interested in Ted's dogs.The fun comes as thick and fast as a blizzard when Ted decides to gain his dad's respect by defending his mother's title. The only trouble is, he's never raced sled dogs in his life... Two Oscar winners come together in this hilarious movie, as Cuba Gooding Jr plays the dentist who spends a lot of his time up to his waist in snow, while James Coburn is his father, who's out to get his son's inheritance. Laughter comes in flurries as Gooding proves how cool he is, in a very different way from his normal roles!(n)

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: A despondent parole officer is aided in his struggle against domestic complacency by three criminals whose lives have gone off the rails in this ensemble comedy from first-time director Brian Jett. From the outside, Walter Dishman (David Denman) has a perfect life. But on the inside, he's slowly suffocating. Little does Walter realize that help can sometimes come when you least expect it. Having recently stolen more than her psychotic ex-boyfriend's heart, Darla DeMint (Gillian Jacobs) is on the run when she becomes Walter's latest assignment. And she's not the only lost-soul in need of some guidance: a lifelong criminal, cantankerous senior Artie Satz (Ed Asner) just isn't taken seriously by his would-be victims anymore, and in the wake of being convicted of insurance fraud, Ivy League educated doctor Kris Styles (Kevin Hart) finds himself forced to work a series of low-level jobs while his marriage crumbles. Somewhere between helping his troubled clients get back on their feet and reevaluating his own humdrum existence, Walter begins to look at his life, and his marriage, in a new light(n)

programme.title: White Men Can't Jump
programme.desc: The only colour that basketball hustlers Sidney and Billy are worried about is green, as they use their different backgrounds to their full advantage(n)

programme.title: The Deep End of the Ocean
programme.desc: Michelle Pfeiffer's three-year-old son Ben disappears into thin air when Pfeiffer visits a class reunion. Detective Whoopi Goldberg dedicates herself to the search, but there is no trace... until nine years later, when he is found in the care of John Kapelos, who has innocently taken Ben on from the now-dead kidnapper in Ulu Grosbard's emotional thriller. Until nine years later, when he is found in the care of John Kapelos, who has innocently taken the child on from the now-dead kidnapper in Ulu Grosbard's emotional thriller

programme.title: Into the West
programme.desc: The Irish 'Into the West' is a film about two young boys, Tito and Ossie, whose father "Papa" Reillywas "King of the Travellers" until his wife, Mary, died during the birth of their second son, Ossie. The boys grandfather (David Kelly) is an old story-telling Traveller, who regales the children with Irish folk-tales and legends. When he is followed by a beautiful white horse called Tir na nOg (meaning "Land of Eternal Youth" in Irish), from the sea to Dublin, where the boys and their father have now settled down in a grim tower block in Ballymun, the boys are overwhelmed with joy and dreams of becoming cowboys. The horse is stolen from them and they begin their adventure to get their mystical horse back. They escape the poverty of a north Dublin council estate, and ride "Into the West" where they find that Tir na nOg is not just a horse

programme.title: Ant-Man
programme.desc: A con artist named Scott Lang (Paul Rudd) gets a shot at redemption when his mentor (Michael Douglas) asks him to protect a superpowered suit. Donning the stunning technology, which shrinks him down to minuscule size, he fights off villains seeking to steal the invention, and organizes a heist that could save the world. Peyton Reed directs this high-octane superhero flick

programme.title: Savage Family Wild
programme.desc: The Sengi Forest. In a coastal forest in Africa, the squad encounters an animal thought to be extinct

programme.title: Savage Family Wild
programme.desc: Beware of Wolves. In Yellowstone Park, the squad discovers that wolves are attacking farmers' livestock

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Teenage rock hopper penguin Cody Maverick is an up-and-coming surfer whose life changes when he enters the annual penguin surfing championships as a tribute to his dead hero Big Z - and comes up against egotistical current champion Tank Evans, who's not about to give up his crown easily. Cody also encounters reclusive, ageing surfer Geek, who teaches him some important lessons about surfing and life

programme.title: The Karate Kid Part III
programme.desc: Kreese, the ex-marine whom Miyagi humbled with a few punches and kicks, has never forgotten the bitter taste of defeat. Bankrupt after the first tournament defeat, he's back with a particularly nasty friend and a new trainer - and he's aching to lure Miyagi and Daniel into the fight of their lives

programme.title: Stick It
programme.desc: Gym-dandy exercise about a teen troublemaker (Missy Peregrym) who, when given a choice of jail time or gymnastics, opts to re-enter the competitive world of the latter. Unfortunately, she's not head over heels about the coach (Jeff Bridges), a hard-nosed and manipulative instructor who doesn't put up with her nonsense and attitude, but does realize the talent that she possesses. Written and directed by Jessica Bendinger. Vanessa Lengies, Maddy Curley, Polly Holliday, Jon Gries, Gia Carides

programme.desc: Swashbuckling adventure about a country-bred young man who dreams of becoming a Musketeer only to find that they have been disbanded by order of Cardinal Richelieu. He soon becomes involved in an attempt to avert war between England and France, his native country. Based loosely on the book by Alexandre Dumas

programme.title: Roll Bounce
programme.desc: A handful of inner-city kids move up to the big time in this teen-centric musical. Xavier Smith (Bow Wow), known to his friends as X, is a teenager growing up on the South Side of Chicago in the late '70s. X and his buddies are the hotshot skaters at the Palisades Gardens, a neighborhood roller rink where local kids roll to the latest disco sounds, but X loses his status as king of the hill when the Palisades closes down. With no skating action close by, X and his friends head uptown to the Sweetwater Roller Rink, where they feel like country mice in the big city among the expert skate dancers and beautiful women. But skating means a lot to X -- with his widower father, Curtis (Chi McBride) going through a bad patch, skating gives him a sense of accomplishment and a belief in his own talent. So X and company keep heading uptown to Sweetwater, where they prepare to take on Sweetness (Wesley Jonathan) and his crew of the rink's best dancers for the upcoming Roller Jam Skate-Off. X befriends a young local girl named Tori (Jurnee Smolett) and finds a good reason to go uptown when he meets a pretty skater girl, Naomi (Meagan Good). Meanwhile, Tori's mother, Vivian (Kellita Smith) takes an interest in Curtis. Featuring a score of classic '70s R&B and disco, Roll Bounce was directed by Malcolm D. Lee, who enjoyed a breakthrough hit with 2002's Undercover Brother

programme.title: Stick It
programme.desc: Gym-dandy exercise about a teen troublemaker (Missy Peregrym) who, when given a choice of jail time or gymnastics, opts to re-enter the competitive world of the latter. programme.title: Fever Pitch
programme.desc: Ben (Jimmy Fallon) must choose between his love for Lindsey (Drew Barrymore) and the baseball team he supports, the Boston Red Sox. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch. Based on Nick Hornby's novel Fever Pitch and released in America under that title, the two leads bring the same warmth and humour to their roles as their British counterparts. Even sports fans unfamiliar with baseball will know the pain that comes from attending an important function when your team are playing a crucial match(n)

programme.desc: The superhero battles a space sludge, which causes his suit to turn black and enhances his powers, but also begins to take over his personality. Meanwhile, the man who caused his uncle's death becomes Sandman; and the New Goblin is out to avenge his father's death(n)

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: ESPN's flagship program provides a thorough presentation of sports news, highlights and analysis. The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia

programme.title: Donnie Brasco
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Donnie Brasco, a Mafia mobster who's thick as thieves with Lefty Ruggerio (Al Pacino), a leading man in the Organisation. But Donnie is also Joe Pistone, an Fbi agent sent to infiltrate who instead becomes seduced by the camaraderie on offer. Mike Newell's film, based on a true story (Pistone is still part of the witness protection programme), is more concerned about friendship, loyalty and the agony of duplicity than the reality of mob violence

programme.desc: A pair of chemical engineers demonstrate a capsule that can keep liquids hot for a longer period of time; a mom has an idea for cleaning stuffed toys; two Oakland men try to drum up interest in their garden-wall system; and a married couple dish out ice cream made with liquid nitrogen. Also: an update on a jewelry business from Season 3

programme.title: Your Money, Your Vote: The Democratic National Convention

programme.title: Shark Tank

programme.title: West Texas Investors Club

programme.title: West Texas Investors Club

programme.title: Inside Death Row
programme.desc: Inside the busiest execution chamber in the USA. In the small town of Huntsville, Texas 18 inmates were executed in 2008 alone, 423 between 1982 and 2008

programme.title: Prison Nation
programme.desc: An in-depth look inside six of the nation's most notorious prisons, which are besieged with violence, overcrowding, mental illness, predation and gang wars. Included: interviews with inmates and prison psychiatrists

programme.title: Aryan Brotherhood
programme.desc: In the maximum-security prison world of murderers and rapists, they are the most feared. With nicknames like The Beast and The Hulk, the warriors of The Aryan Brotherhood are the most violent criminals behind bars men who strangle with their bare hands, shank guards, gouge out their enemies eyes at the slightest sign of disrespect. Forged in prison out of race wars against black gangs, prison officials tried to scatter the Brotherhood across the country but that only spreads their power nationwide. Today, their reach extends far beyond the windowless cells of maximum security from which they run a highly organised trafficking enterprise dealing in crystal meth, prostitution, intimidation and murder. We delve behind the bars to unveil the secrets of the vicious gang of white supremacists that has gained a stranglehold over the nations prisons. Jailhouse interviews with active Aryans and surveillance footage of ruthless attacks on guards and other inmates reveal their deadly tactics. They recruit only the most ruthless, brutal and intelligent inmates and to enter the Brotherhood a man must kill, and to leave he must die. They call this blood in, blood out. Well reveal how they wield their power through intimidation and force, ordering hits on family members of their enemies and anyone else who gets in their way. Locked in solitary 9x12 barren cells 23 hours a day, they are a true secret society, virtually invisible to the outside world? and yet they wield a culture of terror ordering hits through Morse code, female couriers and elaborate cryptograms in invisible ink. By the time investigators break their codes, the targets are often already dead. Also profiled are the law enforcement officers who dare to take the Brotherhood on and are instrumental in bringing its top leaders to justice in the largest death-penalty case in US history

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.sub-title: To The Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: To The Ends of the Earth. David Attenborough travels to the ends of the Earth on an extraordinary journey across the polar regions of our planet. The Arctic and Antarctic are the greatest and least known wildernesses of all - magical ice worlds inhabited by the most bizarre and hardy creatures on Earth. At the North Pole, the sun returns after six months of darkness. A pair of courting polar bears reveal a surprisingly tender side and at the Greenland ice cap, humpback whales join the largest gathering of seabirds on Earth to feast in the Alaskan waters. To the south, the tree line marks the start of the taiga forest, which contains one third of all trees on earth. At the other end of the planet, in the Southern Ocean, penguins struggle to escape a sea lion and teams of orcas use giant waves to wash seals from ice floes. Below the ice, woodlice the size of dinner plates and terrifying sea spiders can be found whilst above, David retraces the routes of early explorers

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Spring. In Spring, the Polar animals must mate and fall pregnant quickly to ensure the survival of their young before the end of the very short summer

programme.title: Planet Earth: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Summer. In Summer, there is 24 hour daylight in the Poles. The land becomes green and productive, and there is an abundance of food for the baby animals

programme.desc: Hunger at Sea - Oceans. Ocean hunting is examined, featuring blue whales; sharks; sea lions; and dolphins
